programme.title: House of Wax
programme.desc: A bunch of college students are stranded in a small town where suffering for art takes on a whole new meaning in this tale of terror. Carly (Elisha Cuthbert) and her boyfriend, Wade (Jared Padalecki), have hit the road with a handful of their friends to attend a championship college football game; tagging along with them are Carly's bratty friend Paige (Paris Hilton, Carly's trouble-making twin brother Nick (Chad Michael Murray), and Blake (Robert Ri'chard), Paige's latest boy toy. While camping out for the night, the gang makes the mistake of getting on the wrong side of a mysterious local redneck, and the next morning they discover that Wade's car no longer works. As the others continue on to the big game, Carly and Wade make their way into the closest town, Ambrose, and discover it's all but deserted, except for a local tourist attraction, the House of Wax. However, it isn't long before they find out why the wax sculptures at the museum look so freakishly real, and discover a pair of murderous brothers are keen on making them part of the next exhibit. House of Wax is an in-name-only remake of the well-remembered 1953 3-D horror outing starring Vincent Price, which was in turn based on the 1933 picture Mystery of the Wax Museum

programme.title: American Experience
programme.desc: Nixon. Part of the American Experience series on the presidents, this three-hour documentary examines the quest, triumph, fall, and legacy of one of America's most fascinating and controversial presidents. From his modest beginnings among the lemon groves in Yorba Linda, CA, to his taking on the highest position in the nation, the story of Richard Milhous Nixon is characterized by contradiction. A staunch anti-communist, Nixon opened up relations with China and the Soviet Union and took steps to end the conflict in Vietnam. American Experience describes how Nixon promoted family values and how he used his poker earnings to finance his first political campaign. From congressman to senator to vice president under Eisenhower, a man uncomfortable in his own skin, Nixon was nonetheless a tireless campaigner. The program details the "Pink Lady" campaign, the "Checkers" speech, and the humiliation of Watergate

programme.title: Globe Trekker

Also: Hammerwood Lodge in East Sussex; Saltaire in Yorkshire; Trafalgar Square; Buckingham Palace; and the Clifton Suspension Bridge in Bristol

After a thrilling game of "Kick The Baby," Kyle's adopted brother Ike is abducted by the same aliens who had visited Cartman the night before in order to insert a big metal hooba-jube into his rectum. The anal probe causes Cartman to expel flaming gas and eventually sprout an 80-foot satellite dish, which attracts the aliens. Kyle's barrage of obscenities prompts Ike's release, and the aliens present a gift to the beings of earth they have judged to be the most intelligent and wise (not humans, of course) before they leave

programme.sub-title: Two Guys Naked in a Hot Tub
programme.desc: Two Guys Naked in a Hot Tub. This is the middle of a three-episode story arc in which each episode reveals what Eric, Stan, and Kyle are up to while their parents attend a meteor shower party. Stan's parents have brought him to the party, but force him to play with the uncool kids downstairs. While his parents confront a possible change in their sexual orientation, Stan leads the other kids, dressed in women's clothes, in an escape attempt. The Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, and Firearms; Charlie's Angels; and sexual swingers all suffer satiric barbs in this more irreverent than usual episode of South Park. "Two Guys Naked in a Hot Tub" first aired July 21, 1999, on Comedy Central

Eric, Stan, Kenny, Kyle, and the rest of the children of the town are falling all over themselves in an attempt to get the newest Chinpokomon toys. Slowly, the kids begin speaking a foreign language. An investigation uncovers that Chinpokomon is being used to brainwash kids into Anti-American actions. This typically irreverent episode of South Park references Independence Day and gets big laughs from a very old (and politically incorrect) gag concerning the physical size of various nationalities. programme.title: Rio
programme.desc: A misfit macaw named Blu (voice of Jesse Eisenberg) heads to Rio de Janeiro, embarks on a magnificent journey, and makes some loyal new friends in this animated adventure for the entire family. Domesticated from the time he was just a hatchling, Blu traded a life in the clouds for a contented existence in Moose Lake with his doting owner, Linda (Leslie Mann). They live under the impression that Blu is the last of his kind, but upon receiving word that a female macaw named Jewel (Anne Hathaway) has been discovered in Rio de Janeiro, Linda and Blu set their sights on South America on a mission to replenish the species. Shortly after their arrival in the Brazilian capitol, however, the two rare birds fall victim to a gang of greedy animal smugglers intent on making a mint by selling Blu and Jewel to the highest bidder. But the headstrong Jewel isn't about to be locked in a cage and put on display, so when the opportunity arises she stages a daring escape with the help of some wisecracking local birds, and takes her new friend Blu along for the ride. With the bumbling birdnappers fast closing in, Blu realizes that his only hope for making a clean getaway and reuniting with Linda is to finally summon the courage he needs to take flight. Rio also features the voices of Tracy Morgan, Jamie Foxx, George Lopez, and will.i.am

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Disappeared. This Emmy Award-winner for Outstanding Drama Series also holds the record for receiving the most consecutive nominations in that category. Filmed entirely on location in New York, the gritty series looks at crime and justice from both the enforcementand judicial perspective. In the first half-hour, police detectives investigate crimes and arrest suspects, while in the second half-hour, the focus shifts to the complications of the justice system. See why it is well on its way to becoming thelongest running primetime drama ever to air in U.S. television history

Investigating, the detectives discover that the victim was previously reported as having been killed when the World Trade Center was destroyed September 11, 2001. Subsequent clues lead to the arrest of wealthy and influential Bradley Hagen (Stevie Ray Dallimore), an old friend of DA Arthur Branch (Fred Dalton Thompson). This episode was dedicated to the memory of Dr. Paul Chernuchin, the father of writer Michael S. Chernuchin

The case takes on another dimension altogether when it transpires that the crooks specialise in placing terminally ill infants with unsuspecting families

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: DWB. One of the most infamous hate crimes of the 1990s was the source for this episode. Even jaded New York detectives Briscoe (Jerry Orbach) and Curtis (Benjamin Bratt) are shocked by the brutal murder of a black man who was dragged behind a car to his death. Prosecuting the crime proves to be a difficult task, thanks to the reluctance of the only known eyewitness and the evasive behavior of certain NYPD cops. The outcome of the case is as startling as the crime was senselessly vicious

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Bait. The investigation into how a teen got wounded leads to a case involving a young woman's murder and a drug operation

programme.title: Law & Order

As the D.A.'s office squares off against aggressive defense lawyer Danielle Melnick (Tovah Feldshuh), a disturbing secret looms ominously over one of the prosecuting attorneys

programme.title: Contagion
programme.desc: After a woman is struck by a mysterious disease, doctors realise that if they don't find a vaccine quickly it could spell doom for the global population. Thriller

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Fast-paced action adventure about tornado chasers - scientists who track, measure, and predict the viciously destructive storms by observing them at close range. One storm-tracking couple, on the verge of divorce, are thrown back together when a unique opportunity arises to test a revolutionary measuring device on a series of powerful twisters. However, an unscrupulous rival team is also at the scene

Action film about one man's battle to save his family from a series of natural disasters caused by solar eruptions. As the Earth's core temperature rises to dangerous levels, destruction spreads worldwide and the family move from city to city to escape the danger. Meanwhile, the US president along with a determined scientist are also confident that humanity's time is not up yet

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Madea's Big Happy Family
programme.desc: Adapted from the multi-talented playwright/filmmaker's hit stage play of the same name, Tyler Perry's Madea's Big Happy Family finds the cantankerous family matriarch using her unique brand of tough love to help her family weather some particularly rough waters. Madea's niece Shirley has received a frightening medical diagnosis, and she's having a hard time figuring out how to break the news to the rest of the family. Unfortunately she's not the only one in the midst of a crisis, either: Kimberly is suffering from anger issues that are threatening to destroy her marriage; Tammy's marital problems are being compounded by her disobedient children; and Byron is struggling to stay out of the drug trade after spending two years behind bars. Later, as a skeleton in the family closet pops into the picture, Madea and Aunt Bam show that love and laugher can help to overcome even the biggest obstacles

programme.title: Norbit
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy is at his funniest as he plays multiple roles in this outrageous farce about a shy nerd who is married to an obese shrew, but gets a second chance to win the heart of his childhood sweetheart

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Death of a Shoe Salesman. Al (Ed O'Neill) hopes to fulfill a lifelong dream in death: He wants to be buried next to his childhood idol, movie-cowboy sidekick Fuzzy McGee, and Fuzzy's mule Dadgummit. This explains why Al has purchased a cemetery plot that does not accommodate wife Peggy (Katey Sagal). The best scene involves a coffin-shopping excursion, with Dan Castellaneta, aka the voice of Homer Simpson, as a funeral director

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: The Old College Try. Somehow landing a grant of $25,000, Bud hopes to finally move out of the Bundy household and into a top college. Well, that MIGHT have happened had not Bud's parents Al (Ed O'Neill) and Peg (Katey Sagal) found and spent the money (and they didn't even bother to warn Bud with a "We're spending our kid's college fund" bumper sticker). This episode appeared the same week that star Katey Sagal showed up on the cover of TV Guide--in a Santa Claus outfit!

programme.title: Seinfeld
programme.desc: The Kiss Hello. While visiting his grandmother, Jerry hears about some money that Uncle Leo was supposed to have given to Jerry's aunt years ago, thereby creating a fiasco involving Jerry's father. Meanwhile, Jerry is uncomfortable with all of the acquaintances who suddenly want to kiss him hello, Kramer implements his plan to put pictures of each tenant up in the apartment building lobby, and George and Elaine both experience frustrations with a physical therapist whose hair is stuck in the past. Wendie Malick of HBO's Dream On and NBC's Just Shoot Me guest stars as Wendy, the physical therapist. Originally airing February 16, 1995, "The Kiss Hello" was the 14th episode taped for the show's sixth season, despite being the 16th one shown

programme.title: Seinfeld
programme.desc: The Beard. When Jerry claims to never have seen Melrose Place, his police-officer girlfriend decides to finger him as a liar by hooking him up to a polygraph machine. Meanwhile, Elaine formulates a plan to convince her gay, male friend to "switch teams" despite his familiarity with his team's equipment, George begins wearing a toupee only to be set up on a date with a bald woman, and Kramer gets a job as a police lineup stand-in. Jon Gries, Robert Mailhouse, and Katherine LaNasa guest star. Originally airing February 9, 1995, "The Beard" was the 15th episode of the show's sixth season

programme.title: Seinfeld
programme.desc: The Doorman. Jerry runs afoul of a doorman (Larry Miller); Kramer invents a bra for men. Elaine offends Mr. Pitt's neighbor. Sid: Patrick Cronin. Mrs. Payton: Gwen Van Dam. Frank: Jerry Stiller

programme.title: Seinfeld
programme.desc: The Jimmy. George spies an opportunity to make some money, but needs the help of a friend who only talks in the third person. Kramer suffers from a case of mistaken identity

programme.title: Seinfeld
programme.desc: The Doodle. Elaine attempts to score a night in a plush hotel by pretending she's in the city for a job interview. George isn't impressed with a caricature drawing of him

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Why Did I Get Married Too?
programme.desc: This sequel to Tyler Perry's Why Did I Get Married reunites the cast from that earlier movie, again playing a group of eight friends who take an annual week-long vacation with each other. As they reconnect, Sheila (Jill Scott) discovers that her ex-husband, Mike, is planning to wreck her new marriage. Their troubles lead to the others facing some uncomfortable truths about their own relationships. The film co-stars Janet Jackson, Malik Yoba, Michael Jai White, and Louis Gossett Jr

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Madea's Big Happy Family
programme.desc: Adapted from the multi-talented playwright/filmmaker's hit stage play of the same name, Tyler Perry's Madea's Big Happy Family finds the cantankerous family matriarch using her unique brand of tough love to help her family weather some particularly rough waters. Unfortunately she's not the only one in the midst of a crisis, either: Kimberly is suffering from anger issues that are threatening to destroy her marriage; Tammy's marital problems are being compounded by her disobedient children; and Byron is struggling to stay out of the drug trade after spending two years behind bars. Later, as a skeleton in the family closet pops into the picture, Madea and Aunt Bam show that love and laugher can help to overcome even the biggest obstacles

programme.title: Last Holiday
programme.desc: Wayne Wang's remake of the 1950s comedy stars Queen Latifah as Georgia Byrd, an in-store cookery demonstrator who, diagnosed with a brain tumour, throws caution to the wind, cashes in her life savings and goes to the Czech spa town of Karlovy, Vary where her hero Chef Didier works. Impressed by her skills, the two become friends, to the annoyance of millionaire Matthew Kragen, who is determined to expose the parvenu Georgia in front of the hotel's guests

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The One with the Flashback. When Janice asks if any of the friends have ever dated one another, everyone has a flashback to three years earlier. Phoebe moves out of Monica's apartment when her obsessive neatness becomes intolerable. And Chandler, searching for a new roommate, meets Joey

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The One with Monica's Thunder. Monica's miffed when Ross and Rachel's "reunion" upstages her engagement to Chandler, who dreads disappointing his future bride in the bedroom. Also, Phoebe campaigns to play at the wedding; and Joey auditions for the part of a teen

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The One with Rachel's Book. Monica's dream of an expensive fairytale wedding fizzles out after she learns what her parents have done with her wedding fund. Meanwhile Rachel fumes when a teasing Joey stumbles across her juicy late-night reading material, and Ross arrives home and confronts Phoebe and her male client over her thriving massage practice in his apartment

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The One with Phoebe's Cookies. Monica becomes obsessed with obtaining Phoebe's secret cookie recipe. Meanwhile, whilst trying to bond, Chandler accidently gives Monica's dad a lap dance

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: And the First Degree. In the season three finale, Caroline discovers that Max didn't graduate from high school because she failed to turn up for a history exam. She formulates a plan to help her best friend get her diploma and, with a little luck, reconnect with her estranged mother at the same time

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: And the Reality Problem. The fourth season of the New York-set comedy about two friends from different ends of the social spectrum begins. Max and Caroline are approached by a television producer who wants to shoot scenes from an upcoming episode of a Kardashians' reality show in front of the serving window of their cupcake business. Kim Kardashian West guest stars

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: And the DJ Face. Max is mortified when she learns the hot guy she's been spending time with is a deejay at a grocery store

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: And the Childhood Not Included. When Caroline accidentally loses Han's expensive pet fish while cleaning out the tank, Max considers selling a sentimental gift that she has just received from her mother in order to pay for a new one. Oleg and Sophie try to split up with all their casual dates before resuming an exclusive relationship with each other

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Cooper/Kripke Inversion. The Cooper-Kripke Inversion" Howards's nerd hobby gets him into money troubles. Sheldon is forced to work with Kripke while in competition with Kripke, ends up spreading rumors about his sexual relationship with Amy. Howard and Raj get action figures of themselves that cost 1000$

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Spoiler Alert Segmentation. Leonard and Sheldon get into a spat that sends Leonard across the hall to live with Penny. Meanwhile, Raj keeps an eye on Mrs Wolowitz while Howard's away on a trip

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Tangible Affection Proof. Leonard arranges a magical Valentine's Day dinner date for Penny, but the magic doesn't last after a squabbling Howard and Bernadette join them and Penny's ex turns up at the restaurant. Meanwhile, Sheldon assigns his research assistant to find a Valentine's Day present for Amy, while Raj talks Stuart into having a party at the comic-book store

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Monster Isolation. After a terrible date with Lucy, the girl he met at Stuart's comic book shop singles party, Raj vows never to leave his flat or interact with another woman again. Leonard, Howard and Bernadette attempt to cheer him up, with little success. programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: Vin Diesel opted to not appear in the sequel to the film the shot him to stardom in the first place, The Fast and the Furious. With the character of Dominic Toretto out of the picture, 2 Fast 2 Furious concentrates exclusively on the latest exploits of undercover agent Brian O'Connor, played by Paul Walker. In addition, with director Rob Cohen passing, producers have added a dash of credibility to the sequel by hiring John Singleton to helm. What does completely remain from the first film is the presence of fast-living underground street-racing gangs. Moving from Los Angeles to Miami, O'Connor is looking to redeem himself after the events of the first movie, so he again goes undercover to infiltrate another group of thuggish car enthusiasts. This time around he's enlisted the help of ex-con Roman Pierce (Tyrese) and fellow agent Monica Celemente (Eva Mendes) to bring down Carter Verone (Cole Hauser), an importer/exporter who heads up a massive drug trafficking operation. Heading up the supporting cast are hip-hop stars Ludacris and Fabolous

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Static. Dean Jagger stars as Ed Lindsay, a cranky middle-aged man living in a boarding house with several other old-timers, including his former fiancée Vinnie Brown (Carmen Mathews). Fed up with television, Ed squirrels himself away in his room, where he begins tooling around with the antique radio he's found in the cellar. Before long, he is receiving broadcasts from the 1930s and 1940s -- live broadcasts, not reruns. Having opened a window to the past, Ed desperately tries to correct several mistakes he's made in life. Scripted by Charles Beaumont from a story by OCee Ritch, "Static" was one of six videotaped Twilight Zone episodes and was originally telecast March 10, 1961 (and yes, that voice emanating from Ed's old-time radio does belong to future Hogan's Heroes star Bob Crane)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.desc: Signature. A body found in Central Park appears to be the latest victim of a serial killer, forcing Benson to work with an FBI agent familiar with the murder's profile. programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

The case is hampered by the boy's secretive and protective religious community and a grandstanding defense lawyer (Rhea Perlman) who views the trial as an opportunity to push her own agenda

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Inconceivable. A robbery at a sperm bank has Benson and Stabler racing to recover fertilized embryos before it is too late. Janine Turner and Mark Moses guest star

programme.title: Leverage

In order to finally bring justice to Moreau, the team will need to take over the entire country

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The Long Way Down Job. The fourth season kicks off with the high-tech team pursuing a crooked financier. But there's a catch: In order to take down their mark, they must recover lost evidence high up on a mountain

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The 10 Li'l Grifters Job. The Leverage team goes after a mark - except someone kills him before they can finish the con. To finish the case, they have to find the murderer and pull off the sting anyway

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The 15 Minutes Job. Nate and his mod squad try to shut down an unsavory public-relations consultant. They first must turn their mark into a hero, then best him at his own PR game

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The Van Gogh Job. The team track a missing Van Gogh painting and learn the work played an integral role in a World War II love story involving a black soldier and a white heiress

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The Hot Potato Job. The modern-day Robin Hoods tangle with corporate agriculture when they attempt to recover a most unusual stolen object---a potato worth millions of dollars

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The Carnival Job. Nate and his motley crew coordinate a hot plot to steal an advanced computer chip from a high-tech home

programme.desc: The Grave Danger Job. The team launch a scheme to shut down a charming yet thieving funeral director. Not only is their target embezzling money from her mourning clients, she's selling the identities of the recently buried to a Mexican drug cartel

programme.title: Leverage

programme.desc: The Cross My Heart Job. The team goes after an ailing defence contractor who steals a young boy's intended heart for his own. With time running out before the boy dies, the team has to run the con at an airport while they're stuck on a layover

programme.desc: The Actor. Dorothy, Blanche and Rose all fail to become the leading lady when a handsome television actor appears at their local community theatre. But each thinks she has become his special lady off-stage

programme.desc: Room Service. Lilith arrives shattered and needy because her husband has left her. But Frasier finds her vulnerability "highly desirable."

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The Perfect Guy. Bill Campbell guest stars as Dr. Clint Webber, a new "call-in" radio personality hired by station KACL. Dr. Webber's slick, smooth delivery and flawless dispensation of advice pleases everyone at the station -- everyone, of course, but rival radio shrink Dr. Frasier Crane (Kelsey Grammer), who worries that the "perfect" Webber will end up as his permanent replacement. Elsewhere, Niles (David Hyde Pierce) must straighten things out when his dad Martin (John Mahoney) is ejected from a gourmet pet-food shop

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Bad Dog. Bulldog is hailed as a hero during a hold-up at the coffee shop, when in fact he is anything but

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier Gotta Have It. When Frasier begins dating a beautiful woman, he has trouble accepting that the relationship is largely built on physical attraction and seeks reassurance from those around him

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: First Date. Niles tries once again to tell Daphne of his feelings for her, and end up saying he's in love with the first name that comes into his head - Phyllis, his next door neighbour

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Bar Bet. A long-forgotten bet Sam once made with an old friend during a drinking binge may cost him his bar if he doesn't marry Jacqueline Bisset by midnight tomorrow

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Behind Every Great Man. A sharp reporter (Alison La Placa) doing a story on the Boston singles scene represents the ultimate challenge to Sam's reputation as a ladies man when she fails to fall for his smug, self-centered come-ons. Sam: Ted Danson. Diane: Shelley Long

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ricky's Life Story. A Life magazine spread on Ricky makes Lucy envious---and wanting to break into show biz all the more. Fred has an idea to get her off her kick: Show Lucy "how hard show business really is," he advises Ricky, who concocts a backbreaking "challenge dance" routine for her. That's only the beginning of this chapter of Lucy Ricardo's show-business career. Dance Instructor: Louis A. Nicoletti

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: The Girls Go into Business. Once again dreaming of unlimited wealth, Lucy (Lucille Ball) and Ethel (Vivian Vance) allow themselves to be bamboozled into buying Hansen's Dress Shop. The crafty owner of the shop (Mabel Paige) has convinced the girls that they have purchased a gold mine at a bargain price, but before long Lucy and Ethel realize that their "new" emporium -- which they rename three times in a single day -- is a financial bust. Thus, when a gentleman offers the girls three times what they paid for Hansen's to buy it away from them, they jump at the chance...and, as usual, our heroines have leaped before they looked

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.sub-title: Lucy and Ethel Buy the Same Dress
programme.desc: Lucy and Ethel Buy the Same Dress. The women's club to which Lucy (Lucille Ball) and Ethel (Vivian Vance) belong manages to wangle an appearance on a local TV station. Inveigled into hosting the club's variety show, Ricky (Desi Arnaz) goes so far as to rehearse Lucy and Ethel in their big number, a rousing rendition of Cole Porter's "Friendship." Alas, the title of the song proves woefully inappropriate when, unbeknownst to one another, Lucy and Ethel buy identical dresses for their TV appearance

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Equal Rights. Lucy (Lucille Ball) and Ethel (Vivian Vance) demand that their husbands, Ricky (Desi Arnaz) and Fred (William Frawley), treat them as equals. The boys decide to teach the girls a lesson by taking them out to an expensive restaurant -- and then leaving them with the bill. Also in on the scheme is the restaurant's maître d' (Larry Dobkin), who orders Lucy and Ethel to work off their bill by washing dishes. Now it is Lucy and Ethel's turn to get even, which they do by concocting a scheme whereby Ricky and Fred will be persuaded that the restaurant is being robbed. Predictably, nothing goes quite as planned, and the evening ends with two of the main characters behind bars

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Baby Pictures. Lucy and Ricky promise not to brag about Little Ricky---at least, not as much as the Applebys brag about their Little Stevie. Ricky has a reason to insist on modesty: Charlie Appleby (Hy Averback) runs a TV station and Ricky wants to emcee a show on it. Caroline Appleby: Doris Singleton

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy Tells the Truth. Can Lucy go a whole day without telling one fib? Ricky and the Metzes bet her $100 that she can't. So it's a shame that she has a bridge game coming up (questions will concern her age, weight and hair color), and a TV-show audition, at which she's asked to list her talents. Casting Director: Charles Lane. Professor Flaconi: Mario Siletti

programme.desc: Change in the Air. Brick starts middle school, while Sue feels a sense of freedom without Axl around. Meanwhile, Frankie finds out that Axl is texting Mike and not her!

programme.desc: A retired military officer is recruited to work at a school, but his methods clash with the dean of academics. However, these two polar opposites work together to save the school from being auctioned off, and they begin to fall for one another

programme.title: My Summer Prince
programme.desc: A party-boy prince gets into trouble, so his family hire a PR consultant to help rein him in. When circumstances force the consultant's assistant to step in, an unexpected romance ignites

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Two Rode Together. Sophia's friends are passing away one by one. Dorothy is worried and takes Sophia on a short trip. Meanwhile, Rose and Blanche are writing a children's book

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: You Gotta Have Hope. Dorothy is in charge of a hospital charity show and things aren't going her way. She can't find any talent for the talent show and her M.C. has just cancelled

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Fiddler on the Ropes. Without the consent of the other girls, Sophia sinks their life savings in Pepe, a prize fighter. However, on the eve of the fight, the girls discover Pepe is missing and make a shocking discovery

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Till Death Do We Volley. Dorothy is delighted to hear that her high school tennis team is having a reunion. But will old rivalries come to the fore and has her forehand lost any zip?

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Out With Dad. Future CSI co-star Marg Helgenberger makes a guest appearance in this Valentine's Day episode, in which Frasier (Kelsey Grammer) finally wears down his dad Martin's resistance and gets the older man to accompany him to the opera. Actually, this invitation is but a smokescreen, so that Frasier can "accidentally" run into his newest dream girl Emily (Marg Helgenberger). Uncomfortable to begin with, Martin is aghast when Emily's mother (Mary Louise Wilson) expresses an interest in him. To keep mom at arm's length, Martin drops a few hints suggesting that he is gay -- with catastrophic results for Martin's other son Niles (David Hyde Pierce)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Something About Dr. Mary. Kim Coles makes her first series appearance as Mary Thomas, a sassy, outspoken African American woman who subs for the vacationing Roz (Peri Gilpin) as producer and call-screener for Frasier's radio call-in show. Mary's uninhibited demeanor and down-to-earth advice plays quite well with the listeners -- too well for Frasier (Kelsey Grammer), who fears that Mary may end up taking over his show...but he is equally fearful of complaining about it. Elsewhere, nerdy Niles (David Hyde Pierce) hopes to master the manly art of kickboxing -- with disastrous results for Daphne (Jane Leeves)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Whine Club. Mel (Jane Adams) pits Niles against Frasier in a wine-tasting competition; Martin feels guilty for bedding his late friend's widow. Claire: Anita Gillette. Corkmaster: Anthony Heald. Virgil: Richard Stretchberry

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Hot Pursuit. While Niles joins Martin on a stakeout, Roz and Frasier, forced to room together at a conference, flirt with the idea of becoming more than just friends

programme.sub-title: To Thine Old Self Be True

programme.sub-title: If Ever I Would Leave You
programme.desc: If Ever I Would Leave You. Carla's scuzzy ex-husband Nick Tortelli (Dan Hedaya) sheepishly crawls into Cheers when his new wife dumps him. Insisting that he's changed his ways, Nick begs Carla to take him back, going so far as to take a menial job as the pub's janitor to prove that he's sincere. But while the Cheers gang is impressed by Nick's astounding character transformation, Carla isn't entirely buying it

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Executive's Executioner. Norm's boss catches him goofing off at Cheers and, instead of firing him, promotes him to company hatchet man, a position in which the big guy excels with his unique approach to firing employees

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: The French Revue. Ricky (Desi Arnaz) is staging a French-themed musical revue at the Tropicana club. Hoping to appear in the revue, Lucy (Lucille Ball) and Ethel (Vivian Vance) hire waiter Robert DuBois (Alberto Morin) to give them French language lessons -- and in exchange, DuBois will be allowed to sing "Louise" at Ricky's club. While Ricky is delighted to include DuBois in the act, he expressly forbids Lucy to participate in the revue -- which of course means that not only will Lucy show up at the Tropicana, but she will also steal the show

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Redecorating the Mertzes' Apartment. It's redecorating time at the Mertzes'. Too bad the Ricardos would stay away. Lucille Ball, Desi Arnaz, Vivian Vance, William Frawley

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Too Many Crooks. Lucy is spotted sneaking into the Mertzes' apartment (for a thoroughly innocent reason) and soon she's suspected of being a thief known around the neighborhood as "Madame X." Mrs. Trumbull: Elizabeth Patterson. Policeman: Allen Jenkins

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Changing the Boys' Wardrobe. It's time the boys got some new clothes, so Lucy and Ethel sell their old ones---without their knowledge (of course). And rival plots ensue. Meanwhile, Ricky's agent (Jerry Hausner) has him named "one of the 10 best-dressed men," and Fred is his "fashion consultant." Zeb Allen: Oliver Blake. Alberto: Alberto Calderone

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy Has Her Eyes Examined. Hoping to audition for an upcoming movie musical, Lucy (Lucille Ball) practices an energetic jitterbug number with professional dancer Arthur "King Cat" Walsh. The rehearsal gives Ricky (Desi Arnaz) a splitting headache, necessitating a visit to the eye doctor (Shepard Menken). The trouble begins when the doctor decides that Lucy is the one who needs treatment. Thus, he applies eyedrops that temporarily blur Lucy's vision -- just when she is poised to audition with Ricky, Fred (William Frawley), and Ethel (Vivian Vance) in an elaborate "Varsity Drag" routine

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ricky's Old Girlfriend. Ricky is jealous when Lucy comes up with a long list of ex-boyfriends, so he invents an old flame---who just happens to be in town. Her name: Carlota Romano (Rosa Turich), with whom Ricky did perform years before. Young woman: Lillian Molieri. Jerry: Jerry Hausner

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: The 100th. Frankie and Mike drive a cow float in a parade celebrating Orson's 100th anniversary. Meanwhile, Brick works on writing a new town motto, and Axl and his pfriends try to earn some cash by reviving Boss Co

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Halloween IV: The Ghost Story. Sue has a bonding sleepover with her fellow Wrestlerettes, they have a seance, and Sue claims to see the Santa Maria sail across the living room!

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: High Anxiety. After Sophia accidentally knocks a bottle of Rose's pills down the sink, it is discovered, she is addicted to them. Meanwhile, Dorothy and Sophia are hired to be in a pizza commercial

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Little Sister. Rose's sister (Inga Swenson) charms Dorothy and Blanche, and Rose can't convince them that Holly's really a rotter at heart. Gary: Jerry Hardin. Rose: Betty White. Dorothy: Beatrice Arthur. Blanche: Rue McClanahan

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia's Choice. Sophia goes into action after a confused and destitute friend (Ellen Albertini Dow) is moved into a "minimum standards" nursing home. Administrator: Ron Orbach. John: Stanley Ullman. Sophia: Estelle Getty

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rites of Spring. The Gang of Four recall attempts to improve their looks, including a visit to Sophia's hairstylist (Lloyd Bochner) and an aerobics class at a health club. Yvonne: Hilary Shepard. Stan: Herbert Edelman. Sophia: Estelle Getty

programme.title: For Love & Honor
programme.desc: A retired military officer is recruited to work at a school, but his methods clash with the dean of academics. However, these two polar opposites work together to save the school from being auctioned off, and they begin to fall for one another

programme.title: Love on the Air
programme.desc: Two radio hosts who butt heads are forced to co-host a talk show. This leads to an off-air friendship, and before long, a possible romance

programme.title: My Summer Prince
programme.desc: A party-boy prince gets into trouble, so his family hire a PR consultant to help rein him in. When circumstances force the consultant's assistant to step in, an unexpected romance ignites

programme.title: Ms. Matched
programme.desc: A woman who plans extravagant weddings must team up with a penny-wise financial adviser at a wedding expo, and the two of them deliver conflicting advice to engaged couples. However, as they're forced to spend time together, they find common ground

programme.title: Wedding Bells
programme.desc: Two busy professionals who avoid commitments agree to be in their mutual friends' wedding, which requires much more time than they anticipated. However, the bond they form while wedding planning proves to be an eye-opening romantic experience for them

programme.title: Autumn Dreams
programme.desc: Former high-school sweethearts who were briefly married learn their annulment wasn't finalized 15 years ago, and as they reconnect, they begin to reconsider dissolving their union, despite the fact that they're both now engaged to other people

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: High Anxiety. After Sophia accidentally knocks a bottle of Rose's pills down the sink, it is discovered, she is addicted to them. Meanwhile, Dorothy and Sophia are hired to be in a pizza commercial

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Little Sister. Rose's sister (Inga Swenson) charms Dorothy and Blanche, and Rose can't convince them that Holly's really a rotter at heart. Gary: Jerry Hardin. Rose: Betty White. Dorothy: Beatrice Arthur. Blanche: Rue McClanahan

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Based on actual events, a group of US soldiers is sent on a heroic mission to Somalia in 1993 as part of a UN peacekeeping operation. They must capture the top lieutenants of a Somali warlord, in order to quell the civil war and famine that is ravaging the country. Directed by Ridley Scott

programme.title: Longest Days
programme.desc: Janine's visit continues to shake things up for the Staton-House Band and their crew. Wes treats Winston to a guitar lesson from a rock legend(c)

programme.title: Fish and Bird
programme.desc: Ray finds himself in a holding pattern, waiting to see if Belikov will be released from prison. An art dealer invites Ray to a breast cancer benefit where he encounters some former clients. Teresa spirals into postpartum depression. Meanwhile, Mickey goes to great lengths to convince the DA that he was the one behind the Minassian massacre(c)

programme.desc: The jeers and boos of Sanders diehards ring out in Philadelphia, before the Democrats at last make Hillary a historic nominee. But is shattering a glass ceiling enough for Clinton and Kaine to unite the party into a winning coalition?(c)

programme.title: Black Snake Moan
programme.desc: From writer and director Craig Brewer comes this offbeat, Southern Gothic drama about a wild, nymphomaniacal young woman (Christina Ricci) who is imprisoned and broken of her "wickedness" by a kindly blues guitarist (Samuel L. Jackson), even as both suffer in different ways from loneliness and heartache. Justin Timberlake, S. Epatha Merkerson, David Banner and Clare Grant costar in this strange but riveting character study

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Kevin Costner stars as a mutated mariner in a futuristic dystopia where the polar ice caps have melted and the earth is almost entirely submerged, forcing him to battle starvation and outlaws while reluctantly helping a woman and a child try to find dry land

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world

programme.title: The Virgin Suicides
programme.desc: Kirsten Dunst stars in this ethereal drama based on the best-selling novel about a family of repressed teenaged girls in the 1970s who take drastic action to escape their restrictive home life. Danny DeVito, Josh Hartnett, Kathleen Turner and James Woods costar in the directorial debut of Sofia Coppola

programme.title: Clouds of Sils Maria
programme.desc: At the peak of her international career, film star Maria Enders (Juliette Binoche) comes face-to-face with an uncomfortable reflection of herself while starring in a revival of the play that made her famous twenty years ago. Co-starring Kristen Stewart and Chloë Grace Moretz

programme.title: The Railway Man
programme.desc: Colin Firth and Nicole Kidman star in this drama about a former British Army officer, who was tormented as a prisoner of war at a Japanese labor camp during World War II, and sets out many years later to confront the man responsible

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An international thriller starring Owen Wilson as an American businessman who resettles his family to a new home in Southeast Asia, where they unwittingly find themselves in the middle of a violent political uprising. Co-stars Pierce Brosnan

programme.title: Mission: Impossible 2
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is back for more fast-paced action in this high-intensity sequel from director John Woo ("Face/Off"). Cruise is Ethan Hunt, a talented government agent ordered to bring down Sean Ambrose (Dougray Scott), a rogue fellow spy who plans to auction a stolen, deadly virus to the highest bidder. The bait? Ambrose's former lover Nyah (Thandie Newton), whose beauty and charm are not lost on Ethan. Anthony Hopkins, Ving Rhames, Rade Serbedzija and Brendan Gleeson costar in this hit thriller

programme.title: Girl With Guitar
programme.desc: Ray is in recovery mode in the aftermath of the shootout, striving to reconnect with his family and repair his relationship with Bridget. Meanwhile, Bunchy and Teresa face impending parenthood together as Abby receives a medical diagnosis that threatens to upend the Donovan family. Hiding out in Nevada, Mickey plots a heist as Detective Muncie closes in on his trail. Season premiere(c)

programme.title: Saw II
programme.desc: The demented serial killer Jigsaw (Tobin Bell) returns in this hit horror sequel in which cop Eric Matthews (Donnie Wahlberg) too easily captures the fiendish murderer, only to helplessly observe as his son is trapped with seven other people in a ghoulish prison devised by the close-mouthed Jigsaw to require acts of horrific self-mutilation to escape. Shawnee Smith, Glenn Plummer, Dina Meyer, Eric Knudsen, Franky G. and Emmanuelle Vaugier costar

programme.title: The Railway Man
programme.desc: Colin Firth and Nicole Kidman star in this drama about a former British Army officer, who was tormented as a prisoner of war at a Japanese labor camp during World War II, and sets out many years later to confront the man responsible

programme.title: Wonder Boys
programme.desc: Comedy-drama based on the acclaimed novel about an English professor (Michael Douglas) who can't stop writing his new manuscript while he grapples over the holidays with his pregnant mistress (Frances McDormand), a gifted but troubled student (Tobey Maguire), a beautiful houseguest (Katie Holmes), a stolen car and his high-pressure, gay editor (Robert Downey Jr.). Rip Torn and Richard Thomas costar in this acclaimed, Oscar-winning film from the director of "L.A. Confidential."

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award® winner Helen Mirren

programme.title: In the Arena
programme.desc: The jeers and boos of Sanders diehards ring out in Philadelphia, before the Democrats at last make Hillary a historic nominee. But is shattering a glass ceiling enough for Clinton and Kaine to unite the party into a winning coalition?(c)

programme.title: Ray
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx stars as the American legend Ray Charles in this musical drama that is an unflinching portrait of the soulful singer's battle to overcome addiction, fight segregation and revolutionize the music as he transformed into one of the country's most beloved performers. Also stars Kerry Washington

programme.title: The Duff
programme.desc: After finding out that her classmates have been calling her "the Duff" (Designated Ugly Fat Friend) behind her back, a high school senior decides to reinvent herself with the help of a charming jock and in the process overthrow the school's social order

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: Cockneys vs. Zombies
programme.desc: When contractors to an East London building site unlock a 350-year old vault full of seriously hungry zombies, it's up to the Cockney McGuire's - and their bumbling mates Mental Mickey and Davey Tuppance - to save the hostages, their grandfather, and East London from zombie Armageddon in this British comedy

programme.title: Lumberjack Man
programme.desc: As a church camp group prepares for a devout spring break vacation, a demonic logger rises from his sap boiler to wreak vengeance and feast on flapjacks soaked in the blood of his victims

programme.title: The Abandoned
programme.desc: This eerie, artful horror phantasm stars Anastasia Hille as a film producer who unexpectedly receives a farmhouse inheritance in her native Russia - a mysterious, island-bound structure that houses many ghostly secrets about her unknown past. Karel Roden costars in this effective, chilling genre picture cowritten and directed by Nacho Cerda

programme.title: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre
programme.desc: In this cult horror classic, five friends pick up a traumatized young hitchhiker, and find themselves stalked and hunted by a deformed chain saw-wielding killer and his family of psychopaths

programme.title: Da Sweet Blood of Jesus
programme.desc: In this stylized Spike Lee thriller, a man cursed by a mysterious ancient African artifact is overwhelmed by a newfound thirst for blood, which leads him into a dangerous romance that calls into question the very nature of love, addiction, sex and status

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Wilbur
programme.desc: A lonely, stuttering London baker who is still something of a mama's boy despite being his thirties pines for love in this quirky comedy from AFI student Dago Rodriguez

programme.title: Seventh Moon
programme.desc: American newlyweds honeymooning in China discover a legendary ancient custom that comes back to haunt them in a remote village

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Adios, Para Siempre
programme.desc: A crime scene photographer is drawn into an ingenious game of images that could spell his doom in this short from filmmaker David Guillermo Barba

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force and when a police droid is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself but a powerful, destructive force sees him as a danger to mankind and will stop at nothing to destroy him. Stars Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver and Dev Patel

programme.title: Space Warriors
programme.desc: A young whiz kid's dreams comes true when he gets an invitation to space camp, where he gets a chance to compete with other brainiacs but the contest takes a turn when he must use his smarts to deal with a real-life disaster. Stars Mira Sorvino and Danny Glover

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Kevin Costner stars as a mutated mariner in a futuristic dystopia where the polar ice caps have melted and the earth is almost entirely submerged, forcing him to battle starvation and outlaws while reluctantly helping a woman and a child try to find dry land

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: Set in a future where a failed climate-change experiment kills all life on the planet, a lucky few board a train that endlessly circles the icy globe but with a cruel and dangerous class hierarchy separating the front from the back passengers, a rebel hero stirs up a riot to challenge the system. Features an all-star cast, including Tilda Swinton, Octavia Spencer, Chris Evans and John Hurt

programme.title: Awaken
programme.desc: A dark thriller about a group of young adults who wake up on a deserted tropical island to find they are being hunted down in a sinister plot to harvest their organs. Stars Edward Furlong and Daryl Hannah

programme.title: Compound Fracture
programme.desc: After the death of his sister, a man returns home with his fiancée and his recently orphaned nephew to take care of his father, and discovers that a truly evil force is lurking outside the house and won't stop until it kills every last member of his family

programme.title: Walter
programme.desc: In this quirky comedy, a ticket taker at the local cinema believes he is the son of God and must decide on the eternal fate of everyone he comes in contact with. Stars William H. Macy and Neve Campbell

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Kevin Costner stars as a mutated mariner in a futuristic dystopia where the polar ice caps have melted and the earth is almost entirely submerged, forcing him to battle starvation and outlaws while reluctantly helping a woman and a child try to find dry land

programme.title: Chappie

Stars Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver and Dev Patel

Features an all-star cast, including Tilda Swinton, Octavia Spencer, Chris Evans and John Hurt

programme.title: Why Horror?
programme.desc: Documentary following horror fan Tal Zimerman as he travels around the world to understand why people thrive on blood and gore, and meets with the genre's leading filmmakers, writers, actors and psychologists to discover how horror is portrayed in different cultures

programme.title: Awaken
programme.desc: A dark thriller about a group of young adults who wake up on a deserted tropical island to find they are being hunted down in a sinister plot to harvest their organs. Stars Edward Furlong and Daryl Hannah

programme.title: The Legend Of Gator Face
programme.desc: Teen pranksters (Johnny White and Dan Warry-Smith) try to put one over on Vernon, Mississippi with their mythical swamp monster, but not unless the real thing has anything to say about it. Paul Winfield costars in this engaging family comedy

programme.title: Santa Claws
programme.desc: In this animated family movie, after Santa has an allergic reaction to cats, a litter of rascally kittens must fill in for him, in a race against the clock to deliver all the presents on time

programme.title: Dark Water
programme.desc: A mother and daughter are ready to start a new life together but when they move into a dilapidated apartment, it seems to take on a mysterious life of its own, unleashing a torrent of living nightmares. Stars Jennifer Connelly

programme.title: Jessabelle
programme.desc: Returning to her childhood home in Louisiana to recuperate from a horrific car accident, a young girl comes face to face with a long-tormented spirit that has no intention of letting her escape

programme.title: Angels of Darkness
programme.desc: Psychological thriller about a woman and her estranged father who go behind the Iron Curtain to a small Hungarian town where strange events unfold. From withering crops to dying farm animals and the local young women going mad -- they must find out if there's a darker secret behind the mass hysteria destroying the town. Stars Stephen Rea

programme.title: The Wraith
programme.desc: Charlie Sheen stars in this eerie sci-fi drama about a gang of car thieves menaced by a mysterious black turbo racing car that seems literally hell-bent on avenging the death of a young teenager. Nick Cassavetes, Sherilyn Fenn, Griffin O'Neal and Randy Quaid costar in this cult classic, a late-night television favorite

programme.title: The Atticus Institute
programme.desc: Mockumentary horror set in a 1960s paranormal research institute, where a new female subject displays demonic prowess. But when the US government steps in to weaponize her abilities, there are disastrous consequences

programme.title: The Culling
programme.desc: Supernatural thriller in which a group of college friends on a road trip find themselves fighting off dark forces at a remote farmhouse, after a chance encounter with a strange little girl

programme.title: Blood Sand
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror that centers around a group of hung over twenty-somethings who rise after a raging all-night graduation party to find the beach has turned into a carnivorous force that will devour anything with a heartbeat

programme.title: Ben Gleib: Neurotic Gangster
programme.desc: Satirical comedian Ben Gleib, dubbed the "next big thing" on Esquire's comedian list, performs his first one-hour comedy special where he tackles social media, singledom, vegetarians and everything in between

programme.title: Margaret Cho: psyCHO
programme.desc: Three-time Grammy® and Emmy® nominated comedian Margaret Cho performs in front of a live audience in this provocative and hilarious comedy special event, tackling off-limits issues from Boko Haram to female empowerment with her razor sharp insight and wit

programme.title: Tooken
programme.desc: In this spoof of the 'Taken' action-film franchise, an ex-CIA agent is now working as a mall security guard who keeps finding his things are being taken from him, including his wife, his dog and his daughter's virginity. With the help of his elderly mother, he must battle his nemesis to free his family. Stars Margaret Cho

programme.title: W. Kamau Bell: Semi-Prominent Negro
programme.desc: Comedy special featuring socio-political comedian W. Kamau Bell, who brings his characteristically biting and hilarious take on the real issues of contemporary America from gentrification to raising his family in a post-Obama nation. Morgan Spurlock directs

programme.title: Ben Gleib: Neurotic Gangster
programme.desc: Satirical comedian Ben Gleib, dubbed the "next big thing" on Esquire's comedian list, performs his first one-hour comedy special where he tackles social media, singledom, vegetarians and everything in between

programme.title: Heartless
programme.desc: In this chilling supernatural tale, a talented young photographer with a disfiguring birthmark discovers a world of reptilian monsters posing as street gangs on the streets of London, who inflict violence on the innocent and offer him everything he's ever dreamed of, but at a deadly price

programme.title: Murder in the Dark
programme.desc: While camping in the ruins of an ancient Turkish town, an innocent game turns deadly for a group of friends

programme.title: Begin Again
programme.desc: A musician is left reeling after her boyfriend strays but her life takes a turn when a disgraced record-label exec stumbles upon her performing in the East Village, and a chance encounter leads to a wondrous mutual transformation, set to the soundtrack of summer in New York City. Stars Keira Knightley and Mark Ruffalo

programme.title: Passion Of Mind
programme.desc: Demi Moore stars in this romantic fantasy as two very different women who seem to be the same person in two different places, France and New York. Is each the figment of the other's imagination, or is something more powerful and wonderfully supernatural going on? William Fichtner, Joss Ackland, Peter Riegert and Stellan Skarsgard costar in this moving, memorable film from French director Alain Berliner ("Ma Vie en Rose")

programme.title: Black Filmmaker Showcase: Hit Me
programme.desc: A man must convince the professional assassin he hired to let him live in this short film from director Steve Minor

programme.title: Boyhood
programme.desc: Filmed over 12 years with the same cast, this groundbreaking Richard Linklater film is the story of growing up seen through the eyes of a boy who literally goes from a child to a young adult before our eyes. Features Patricia Arquette in her Oscar® winning role with Ethan Hawke and Ellar Coltrane

programme.title: The Duff
programme.desc: After finding out that her classmates have been calling her "the Duff" (Designated Ugly Fat Friend) behind her back, a high school senior decides to reinvent herself with the help of a charming jock and in the process overthrow the school's social order

programme.title: The Dramatics (A Comedy)
programme.desc: When an out-of-work actress unexpectedly lands a starring role in the sexually explicit mini-series adaptation of a best-selling erotic novel, her aimless, stoner boyfriend does his best to be supportive. But when her volatile, Oscar® winning co-lead takes "rehearsals" too far, her dream job becomes her boyfriend's worst nightmare and the couple is forced to decide whether or not their relationship is worth fighting for. Stars Pablo Schreiber

programme.title: Jonah Hill / Alan Arkin
programme.desc: Host David Steinberg interviews big stars and living legends as they share never-before-heard anecdotes, intimate memories, and career-defining moments from the past five decades of comedy. This week's guests: Jonah Hill and Alan Arkin(c)

programme.title: The D Train
programme.desc: The dorky head of a high school reunion committee (Jack Black) travels to Los Angeles to track down the most popular guy from his graduating class and convince him to go to the reunion, in an obsessive pursuit of approval and recognition that takes over his life. Also stars Kathryn Hahn and Jeffrey Tambor

programme.title: Lost in the Sun
programme.desc: A small time criminal past finds an unlikely accomplice in a newly orphaned teenage boy, conning him into a dangerous cross country trip where they undertake a series of robberies and hope the past won't catch up with them

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: This highly acclaimed, Oscar(R) winning independent drama marked the extraordinary sophomore effort of writer and director Sofia Coppola, who crafts a resonant, understated drama about a movie star (Bill Murray) visiting Tokyo to appear in a liquor commercial, who befriends the lonely, hotel-bound wife (Scarlett Johansson) of a celebrity photographer. Together, the two lost, culturally adrift, insomniac Americans become platonic soul mates, exploring the city and discovering a kindred spirit to combat their shared isolation

programme.title: Good Kill
programme.desc: A Las Vegas-based drone pilot fights the Taliban by remote control for 12 hours a day, then goes home to the suburbs and feuds with his wife and kids for the other 12. But he is starting to question his mission. Is he creating more terrorists than he's killing and will the war ever end? Stars Ethan Hawke and January Jones

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: A popular high school student is forced to hit the road after the brutal murder of his parents, setting him on a path to the ominous town of Lupine Ridge to find out the truth of his ancestry

programme.title: House of the Dead
programme.desc: Teenagers looking for a rave party on a dark island find to their horror that the event has been overrun by zombies occupying a lonely, abandoned mansion in this chilling action-horror adaptation of the popular video game. Jonathan Cherry, Tyron Leitso, Clint Howard, Ona Grauer, Ellie Cornell, William Sanderson and Jurgen Prochnow star in this film from director Uwe Boll

programme.title: Jamie Marks Is Dead
programme.desc: Despite warnings to the contrary, a high-school student befriends the ghost of a misfit classmate who may have been murdered, and becomes torn between the world of the living and the dead. Stars Liv Tyler

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: Haunting futuristic tale about a young man living in a colorless, bland utopia, who meets the Giver, an older man who keeps the memories of the past, and opens his eyes to see the dangerous truth about the world he is living in. Stars Meryl Streep, Jeff Bridges and Katie Holmes

programme.title: After
programme.desc: When two bus crash survivors awake to discover that they are the only people left in their small town, they must form an unlikely alliance in a race to unravel the truth behind their isolation, as a dark fog concealing danger advances towards the town

programme.title: Lance Armstrong: Stop at Nothing
programme.desc: An intimate documentary about the explosive story of cyclist Lance Armstrong, revealing a portrait of a man who will stop at nothing in the pursuit of money, fame and success. Features candid interviews with his friends and enemies to reveal the truth behind the greatest fraud in sporting history

programme.title: Heatstroke
programme.desc: On a family trip in the African desert, a research scientist unintentionally travels off course and is brutally murdered by an arms dealer. His girlfriend is put to the ultimate survival test as she attempts to evade the killers and protect his teenage daughter. Stars Stephen Dorff

programme.title: Safelight
programme.desc: A high-school student tries to help a troubled runaway escape from the clutches of her psychotic pimp by taking a road trip along the California coastline. Stars Juno Temple and Evan Peters

programme.title: Song One
programme.desc: Oscar winner® Anne Hathaway stars as a woman whose musician brother is left in a coma following a car accident, leading her to seek out his idols and finding herself falling for an unlikely match in this romantic drama set against the backdrop of Brooklyn's vibrant indie music scene

programme.title: After
programme.desc: When two bus crash survivors awake to discover that they are the only people left in their small town, they must form an unlikely alliance in a race to unravel the truth behind their isolation, as a dark fog concealing danger advances towards the town

programme.title: Exists
programme.desc: When a group of friends on a camping trip have an accident on a desolate country road, they unwittingly unleash a bloodcurdling force of nature

programme.title: Cheech and Chong / Dane Cook
programme.desc: Host David Steinberg interviews big stars and living legends as they share never-before-heard anecdotes, intimate memories, and career-defining moments from the past five decades of comedy. This week's guests: Cheech & Chong and Dane Cook(c)

programme.title: Chris Rock
programme.desc: Host David Steinberg interviews comedian and actor Chris Rock, who talks about his influences including his minister grandfather and Eddie Murphy, the type of material that plays across all cultural boundaries, his respect for Bill Cosby and Richard Pryor, and his struggle for fame and success in the years after he left "Saturday Night Live."(c)

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Ten killers sentenced to death for their murderous crimes are flown to a remote island and pitted against each other in a lethal series of fights, with the ultimate victor winning his freedom as the grand prize. Steve Austin, Vinnie Jones, Robert Mammone and Rick Hoffman star in this bone-cracking, hard-driving action thriller

programme.title: Ray
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx stars as the American legend Ray Charles in this musical drama that is an unflinching portrait of the soulful singer's battle to overcome addiction, fight segregation and revolutionize the music as he transformed into one of the country's most beloved performers. Also stars Kerry Washington

programme.title: It Follows
programme.desc: After a seemingly innocent sexual encounter, a 19-year-old girl finds herself plagued by nightmarish visions and can't shake the sensation that someone or something is following her. As the threat closes in, she and her friends must escape the horrors that are only a few steps behind

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Remake of the classic blaxploitation action flick starring Samuel L. Jackson as John Shaft, a New York cop seeking a murder witness (Toni Collette) who can finger a spoiled construction business heir (Christian Bale) for the racially motivated murder of a black student. In the meantime, the wealthy killer has enlisted the aid of a drug dealer (Jeffrey Wright) who wants to move into big league narcotics trafficking. Vanessa L. Williams and Busta Rhymes costar

programme.title: Richard Pryor: Omit The Logic
programme.desc: Mike Epps, Richard Pryor Jr. and others recount the culture-defining influence of Richard Pryor - one of America's most brilliant, iconic comic minds - in this new documentary. Directed by Emmy(R)-winning filmmaker Marina Zenovich and executive produced by Roy Ackerman and Pryor's widow, Jennifer Pryor

programme.title: The Accidental Spy
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars in this globe-trotting adventure as a sporting goods salesman whose dream of being an international spy comes true when he foils a bank robbery and is recruited to search for a missing person in Korea, where he uncovers a plot involving a hidden fortune and a stolen weapon of mass destruction. Eric Tsang and Vivian Hsu costar

programme.title: Mystery, Alaska
programme.desc: When a small town amateur hockey team accepts a challenge to play against the New York Rangers, the entire population must put their petty differences aside and pull together as their small town becomes the center of a nationally televised event. Features an all-star cast, including Russel Crowe, Hank Azaria and Burt Reynolds

programme.title: The One I Wrote For You
programme.desc: A singer/songwriter (Cheyenne Jackson) who walked away from a chance at stardom a decade ago enters a reality TV show contest and finds himself once again drawn into the intoxicating world of fame and fortune. As a semi-finalist, he transforms into an audience favorite - but in his rise to the top, will he forget what matters most?

programme.title: Mr. Holland's Opus
programme.desc: Richard Dreyfuss stars in this sentimental favorite as an aspiring composer who settles uncomfortably into a 30-year career as a high school music teacher, struggling to achieve his dreams while raising a deaf son and only slowly realizing the impact he has had on generations of students. Glenne Headly and Olympia Dukakis costar in this heartwarming drama

programme.title: Backcountry
programme.desc: A thriller based on a true story about a big city couple who go camping along a secluded Canadian trail and find themselves lost and at the mercy of the wild

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman and Clive Owen star in this sword-clashing adventure of a fallen warrior who rises against a corrupt and sadistic ruler to avenge his dishonored master

programme.title: Freedom
programme.desc: Two men are separated by time and united by their search for freedom in this tale of a slave escaping via the underground railroad in the 1800s and a sea captain setting sail one hundred year's earlier, with a ship full of slaves that will set in a motion an unstoppable legacy. Stars Cuba Gooding Jr

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell star as undercover detectives who get involved in a case of drug trafficking and murder in South Florida that takes a personal turn

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: Writer and director Quentin Tarantino reinvigorated the noir crime drama with this wildly entertaining blockbuster that casts John Travolta and Samuel L. Jackson as hit-man partners whose meandering paths cross those of a powerful gangster (Ving Rhames), the latter's overdosing girlfriend (Uma Thurman), a desperate boxer (Bruce Willis) and a pair of stickup artists named Honeybunny (Amanda Plummer) and Pumpkin (Tim Roth). "Leaves viewers both exhilarated and exhausted - hearts racing and knuckles white from the ride." -Amazon.com

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: A surprise box office smash, this grisly horror tale terrified audiences with its story of two men (Cary Elwes and Leigh Whannell) who awaken imprisoned in the lair of a serial killer nicknamed Jigsaw, who plays vicious mind-games with his victims until he can manipulate them into killing each other. Meanwhile, a pair of desperate detectives (Danny Glover and Ken Leung) try to find the kidnapper before he can carve up his next pair of victims

programme.title: Backcountry
programme.desc: A thriller based on a true story about a big city couple who go camping along a secluded Canadian trail and find themselves lost and at the mercy of the wild

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of today's finest stand-ups, including Baron Vaughn, Andrew Santino, Emily Heller, James Adomian and Moshe Kasher along with some glamorous sneak peeks of the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas

programme.title: The Best Man
programme.desc: A group of successful college friends reunite for a wedding, but when one of the bridesmaids gets her hands on the best man's steamy new novel about to hit bookstores, a series of scandals about the friends are revealed that wreak havoc on their relationships. Stars Taye Diggs and Nia Long

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell star as undercover detectives who get involved in a case of drug trafficking and murder in South Florida that takes a personal turn

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: Willow Creek
programme.desc: A young couple find themselves face-to-face against a terrifying evil when they venture into the remote woods of Bigfoot country to research the existence of the infamous ape

programme.title: Jersey Girl
programme.desc: Liv Tyler and Ben Affleck star in this romantic comedy about a music promoter whose career is sidelined by an unexpected tragedy and a personal blowup, leaving him to take care of his precocious daughter. Also stars Jennifer Lopez, Will Smith and Jason Biggs

programme.title: The Abandoned
programme.desc: This eerie, artful horror phantasm stars Anastasia Hille as a film producer who unexpectedly receives a farmhouse inheritance in her native Russia - a mysterious, island-bound structure that houses many ghostly secrets about her unknown past. Karel Roden costars in this effective, chilling genre picture cowritten and directed by Nacho Cerda

programme.title: Rampart
programme.desc: Woody Harrelson stars as a cop who asserts his own code of justice, blurring the lines between right and wrong, but when he gets caught on tape beating a suspect, he finds himself caught in a downwards emotional spiral, amidst a corruption scandal. Also stars Sigourney Weaver, Robin Wright and Ice Cube

programme.title: Black Snake Moan
programme.desc: From writer and director Craig Brewer comes this offbeat, Southern Gothic drama about a wild, nymphomaniacal young woman (Christina Ricci) who is imprisoned and broken of her "wickedness" by a kindly blues guitarist (Samuel L. Jackson), even as both suffer in different ways from loneliness and heartache. Justin Timberlake, S. Epatha Merkerson, David Banner and Clare Grant costar in this strange but riveting character study

programme.title: Good Kill
programme.desc: A Las Vegas-based drone pilot fights the Taliban by remote control for 12 hours a day, then goes home to the suburbs and feuds with his wife and kids for the other 12. But he is starting to question his mission. Is he creating more terrorists than he's killing and will the war ever end? Stars Ethan Hawke and January Jones

programme.title: Calendar Girls
programme.desc: Comedy based on the true story of a women's group in a small English town who choose to upend the traditional order by posing nude for their annual charity calendar. Stars Helen Mirren and Julie Walters

programme.title: Berto vs. Soto Karass (R)
programme.desc: Andre Berto (28-2, 22 KOs) steps into the ring with Jesus Soto Karass (27-8-3, 17 KOs) for a 12-round Welterweight bout. Live from the AT&T Center in San Antonio, Texas. REPLAY

programme.title: Showtime Championship Boxing: Mayweather vs. Maidana I (?)
Showtime Championship Boxing: DeGale vs. Bute (R) (?)
60 Minutes Sports
programme.desc: The first name in news magazines is the last word in sports. Jack Ford profiles the 75th Anniversary of the U.S. Naval Academy's Brigade Boxing Championships and its role in creating future military leaders. Plus, twenty-five years after "Friday Night Lights" exposed the grit of big time high school football Sharyn Alfonsi revisits some of its true-life characters in Odessa, Texas, and watches this year's team chase a dream. And Mo Rocca goes out on the high seas to report on one of the most lucrative deep sea fishing tournaments in the world

programme.title: War
programme.desc: A grieving FBI agent is bent on avenging the death of his partner by hunting down the assassin that pulled the trigger, but uncovers some disturbing secrets on his crusade for justice. Jason Statham and Jet Li star in this stylish action thriller with John Lone

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: Writer and director Quentin Tarantino reinvigorated the noir crime drama with this wildly entertaining blockbuster that casts John Travolta and Samuel L. Jackson as hit-man partners whose meandering paths cross those of a powerful gangster (Ving Rhames), the latter's overdosing girlfriend (Uma Thurman), a desperate boxer (Bruce Willis) and a pair of stickup artists named Honeybunny (Amanda Plummer) and Pumpkin (Tim Roth). "Leaves viewers both exhilarated and exhausted - hearts racing and knuckles white from the ride." -Amazon.com

programme.title: Meru
programme.desc: In the high-stakes game of big-wall climbing, the Shark's Fin on Mount Meru may be the ultimate prize. In this documentary three close friends - who are among the world's best professional climbers - battle their complicated pasts, inner demons and nature's harshest elements in an attempt to confront what is arguably the most technically complicated and dangerous peak in the Himalayas - one that has never been scaled to completion

programme.title: Frank & Jesse
programme.desc: Outlaw brothers Frank and Jesse James seek revenge for their murdered brother and become infamous public enemies to the Union soldiers occupying their post-Civil War territory but legendary heroes to the downtrodden locals who cheer their bank-and-train-robbing antics. Rob Lowe, Bill Paxton and Randy Travis star in this Western action adventure

programme.title: Deterrence
programme.desc: While he's trapped in a diner during a freak Colorado snowstorm, the U.S. President (Kevin Pollak) debates strategy with his senior staff during an international crisis provoked by Iraq. Sean Astin, Timothy Hutton and Sheryl Lee Ralph costar in this debut feature from writer-director Rod Lurie ("The Contender")

programme.title: Exists
programme.desc: When a group of friends on a camping trip have an accident on a desolate country road, they unwittingly unleash a bloodcurdling force of nature

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Based on actual events, a group of US soldiers is sent on a heroic mission to Somalia in 1993 as part of a UN peacekeeping operation. They must capture the top lieutenants of a Somali warlord, in order to quell the civil war and famine that is ravaging the country. Directed by Ridley Scott

programme.title: Frank & Jesse

Rob Lowe, Bill Paxton and Randy Travis star in this Western action adventure

programme.title: The Warrior's Way
programme.desc: After a lifetime of training in swordsmanship and hand-to-hand combat, the world's most dangerous fighter flees his homeland to start a new life in the American west. But soon the hunter becomes the hunted, and the legendary warrior must wage a fierce, all-out battle against a renegade gang of outlaws and a pack of murderous assassins from his past. Stars Kate Bosworth and Academy Award® winner Geoffrey Rush
