programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
programme.desc: In this tense, psychological thriller based on the notorious true story, Billy Crudup stars as a Stanford University professor who, in 1971, cast 24 student volunteers as prisoners and guards in a simulated jail to examine the source of abusive behavior in the prison system with astonishing results that reveal the dark side of power and the effects of imprisonment

programme.title: Winter Wonderlust
programme.desc: A few too many cocktails turn Marisa and Brian's blind date into an overnight stay. Foiled by an ice storm, they then get unexpectedly stuck together over a holiday weekend. With nothing else to do but get to know one another, they learn that sometimes first impressions are quite wrong

programme.title: X-Rated: The Greatest Adult Movies of All Time
programme.desc: Combining scintillating film clips of the 32 greatest adult movies ever produced with in-depth interviews from the biggest stars in the industry, this erotic documentary is the definitive look at the art of carnal films. Hosted by Chanel Preston, with Jenna Jameson, Ron Jeremy, Marilyn Chambers, Christy Canyon, Jessica Drake, Georgina Spelvin and many more

programme.title: State Property 2
programme.desc: A Philadelphia drug lord wages war with a pair of bitter rivals while a third player quietly consolidates power and wealth in this crime sequel that stars Damon Dash (who also wrote and directed), Beanie Siegel, Noreaga, Ol' Dirty Bastard, Mariah Carey and Cam'ron

programme.title: Deterrence
programme.desc: While he's trapped in a diner during a freak Colorado snowstorm, the U.S. President (Kevin Pollak) debates strategy with his senior staff during an international crisis provoked by Iraq. Sean Astin, Timothy Hutton and Sheryl Lee Ralph costar in this debut feature from writer-director Rod Lurie ("The Contender")

programme.title: Turbulence 2
programme.desc: In this action packed drama, a therapy group who have completed a program to overcome their severe fear of flying are the victims of an airplane hijacking. With the pilot dead and the hijackers threatening to blow them all away, one of the passengers must race against the clock to bring the plane safely to the ground

programme.title: Bloodsport
programme.desc: Based on a true story, Jean-Claude Van Damme stars as an American soldier, who decides to leave the military and compete in a famous Hong Kong martial arts tournament that is a notoriously dangerous fight to the death

programme.title: Blown Away
programme.desc: When an explosion rocks the city of Boston, an expert from the city's elite bomb squad goes on the hunt for the culprit and finds himself in a deadly game of cat and mouse with a figure from his past

programme.title: Bloodsucking Bastards
programme.desc: Horror comedy about a dutiful employee at a soul-crushing corporation who finds out that his new boss has promoted a vampire, who is destroying the office one body at a time

programme.title: Unnatural
programme.desc: James Remar and Sherilyn Fenn star in this horror flick about a morally ambiguous corporation that experiments with genetic modification, resulting in the creation of a man-hunting creature who escapes and terrorizes an unsuspecting community of cabin dwellers in a horrifying game of cat and mouse

programme.title: Miami Vice

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: A newspaper cartoonist becomes obsessed with solving San Francisco's infamous "Zodiac" serial killer case, and eventually closes in on a suspect after the case has long become cold in this fact-based thriller starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Mark Ruffalo, Robert Downey Jr. and Chloe Sevigny

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: Funnyman Andy Samberg stars in his first feature, a zany farce about a development-arrested youth who believes that stunt work is in his blood - despite his many failed, highly hazardous attempts at record-setting on his scooter to the contrary. Sissy Spacek, Ian McShane, Isla Fisher, Jorma Tacone, Bill Hader, Danny McBride and Will Parnell costar in this likable, goofy comedy

programme.title: Lance Armstrong: Stop at Nothing
programme.desc: An intimate documentary about the explosive story of cyclist Lance Armstrong, revealing a portrait of a man who will stop at nothing in the pursuit of money, fame and success. Features candid interviews with his friends and enemies to reveal the truth behind the greatest fraud in sporting history

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people

programme.title: The Prisoner Of Zenda, Inc.
programme.desc: A fourteen-year-old heir (Jonathan Jackson) to dad's corporation faces the wrath of his power-mad uncle (William Shatner), who plots his nephew's overthrow. Don S. Davis costars in this humorous saga loosely based on Anthony Hope's novel

programme.title: Star Kid
programme.desc: A dorky seventh grader who spends his days avoiding the class bully and dreaming of becoming a comic book hero gets to try on the superpower he's always wanted when an extraterrestrial spacecraft crashes on earth

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award® winner Helen Mirren

programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands

programme.title: Against the Tide
programme.desc: A Showtime Sports chronicle of the seminal 1970 college football matchup between Alabama's Crimson Tide and USC Trojans at Birmingham's Legion Field. Through interviews with former Alabama legends Joe Namath, John Mitchell and USC stars Sam "Bam" Cunningham, Jimmy Jones and more, this documentary examines coach Paul "Bear" Bryant's surprising decision to bring a dominant, racially integrated football team onto the field in Birmingham for the very first time and reveals the impact college football played in the struggle for integration

programme.title: I Am Giant: Victor Cruz
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Victor Cruz's improbable rise to football stardom, the life shattering injury that derailed his career and his dramatic attempt at a comeback, revealing the man behind the mask, as he faces the biggest challenge of his life

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn

Benjamin Salisbury, Meadow Sisto, Emannuel Logrono, Jorge Luis Ramos and J.A. Preston co-star

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: Based on an inspiring true story, Academy Award® winner Cuba Gooding Jr. stars as a man released from prison after 18 years, who starts a chess club to keep inner-city youth from the streets and give them what he never had: a future

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People
programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star

programme.desc: Sixty years after fleeing Vienna, an elderly Jewish woman (Helen Mirren) attempts to reclaim family possessions that were seized by the Nazis. Among them is a famous portrait of her beloved aunt, painted by Gustav Klimt. With the help of a young lawyer she embarks upon a lengthy legal battle to recover what rightfully belongs to her family

programme.title: Cinema Paradiso
programme.desc: This tender, Oscar(R) winning saga is a critical and commercial triumph that chronicles a boy's wondrous childhood in a small Sicilian village. It's a time spent largely in Cinema Paradiso, the local bijou where Alfredo the projectionist (Philippe Noiret) uses movies to broaden the boy's horizons and make him hungry for the world outside their village. This splendid saga stars Jacques Perrin, Salvatore Cascio, Roberta Lena and Mario Leonardi

programme.title: Miles To Go Before I Sleep
programme.desc: Short documentary chronicling the true story of famed musicians and the relationships they have with their roadies. Features music legends Chad Smith (Red Hot Chili Peppers), Chris Shiflett (Foo Fighters) and Jim James (My Morning Jacket), who speak candidly about their time on the road and the importance of the crew who work tirelessly to put the show together, as well as capturing a day behind-the-scenes with the crew of Pearl Jam

programme.title: G.B.F.

programme.title: Pride

programme.desc: The life of an unscrupulous Hollywood talent agent (Ben Affleck) comes unraveled when he learns that his beautiful wife has been having an affair with his top client, then loses his highly detailed and personal journal to an ambitious reporter. Rebecca Romijn, Bai Ling and John Cleese costar in this comedy-drama from writer/director Mike Binder ("Reign Over Me")

programme.title: Happy Endings
programme.desc: The darkly funny sensibilities of writer-director Don Roos ("The Opposite of Sex") are infused throughout this sprawling tale of dysfunctional family connections broken and remade - between step-siblings who once had a baby, a gay couple trying to win custody of a lesbian couple's child, and a bohemian artist who dumps her boyfriend for his father. Lisa Kudrow, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Jesse Bradford, Jason Ritter, Laura Dern and Tom Arnold star in this twisted, funny take on modern relationships

programme.title: Easy A
programme.desc: Nathaniel Hawthorne's The Scarlet Letter is re-imagined as a contemporary high school comedy in this tale of a scheming student who plots to give her popularity a boost by painting herself the easiest lay in school. Like most high school kids, Olive Penderghast (Emma Stone) just wants to be popular. So much so than when her best friend, Rhiannon (Aly Michalka), asks Olive how her weekend went, the bored teen decides to whip up a spicy white lie just to make things interesting. But that minor exaggeration begins to take on a life of its own when it reaches the ears of motor-mouth gossip Jesus freak Marianne (Amanda Bynes), and in no time the entire student body is abuzz over unassuming Olive's unrepentant weekend of debauchery. Of course not a word of it is true, but that doesn't stop everyone in school from talking, and an amused Olive from deciding to go with the flow. Playing the role of the hussy to the hilt, the girl who used to be invisible begins dressing provocatively and turning heads in the hallways. The students aren't the only ones taking notice, either; Olive's English teacher, Mr. Griffith (Thomas Haden Church), is concerned that the kind of attention she's receiving isn't healthy for a developing girl, and his wife (Lisa Kudrow), the school guidance counselor, is in full agreement. The only people who seem remotely interested in the truth are Olive's trusting and open-minded parents (Stanley Tucci and Patricia Clarkson). As Olive takes note of the parallels between her own situation and the plight of the Scarlet Letter heroine Hester Prynne, she realizes that she may be able to manipulate her newfound notoriety to give fellow classmate Brandon's (Dan Byrd) popularity a much-needed shot in the arm. Olive never thought her little game could possibly have any negative effect on anyone but herself, but when loose lips start sinking ships all around her, she realizes that it's high time for the truth to come out

programme.desc: Dancin' Homer. Homer becomes the Springfield Isotopes mascot after getting drunk with Mr Burns and making a fool of himself at the baseball. His routine goes down so well that he is picked up by the Capital City Capitals, and moves the Simpsons to Capital City

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Last Tap Dance in Springfield. After watching a movie about a sexy tango dancer, Lisa enrols in a tap dance class....only to discover she has two left feet; Bart and Milhouse abandon a camping trip and hide out in a shopping mall

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Insane Clown Poppy. Krusty discovers that he fathered a child during the Gulf War... but then goes on to gamble away his daughter's precious violin during a poker game with Fat Tony. Featuring the guest voices of Joe Mantegna , Stephen King , Drew Barrymore , John Updike , Amy Tan

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Italian Bob. The Simpsons are sent to Italy to get Mr Burns a new sports car after he is teased by some children about his old banger. While in Italy, the family get stranded in a village where Sideshow Bob reigns as mayor

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Elementary School Musical. While Homer and Bart escort Krusty to Oslo to collect a Nobel Prize, Lisa attends Expressions, a performing arts camp. There she meets Sarah, Flynn and Aiesha who welcome Lisa to the camp with a song, before she meets two counsellors Ethan and Kurt who sing and play guitar. At the end of the week Lisa has fallen in love with the theatre and music and has big ambitions

programme.title: Rio 2
programme.desc: Blu and his family embark on an Amazonian adventure when Jewel decides their kids should see the world, but the over-protective father begins to fear that his clan will abandon him once they've experienced life in the wild

programme.title: Rio 2

programme.title: In Living Color
programme.desc: In Living Color's Feedback Line. The Funky Finger guys get a break; customers complain to beautician LaShawn (T'Keyah "Crystal" Keymah); viewer complaints are addressed. James Carrey

programme.title: We Are Your Friends
programme.desc: We Are Your Friends is a romantic drama based around one young DJ's dreams to make it big in the electronic dance music genre. Cole (Zac Efron), who dreams about becoming a big player in the music industry, meets James (Wes Bentley), a more established disc jockey who takes him under his wing. After some time, Cole begins to develop feelings for Sophie (Emily Ratajkowski), who is dating James. Eventually, Cole must make some hard choices about his career as he moves close to Sophie, causing a fracture in the relationship between James and himself. The film co-stars Jon Bernthal (The Walking Dead), and is the first film directed by Max Joseph

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Elidee. Vernon's advised to keep mum about how he got injured; Spencer and Joe clash over the handling of a client as they fend off Andre's threats; Charles isn't sure he's ready for a new challenge; Ricky thinks about relocating

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: Shooting a war film, a group of pampered Hollywood actors suddenly find themselves in the middle of a real conflict

programme.title: Dr. Dolittle 2
programme.desc: Comedy sequel starring Eddie Murphy as the doctor who talks to animals. This time, he's helping a group of creatures save their endangered Pacific forest from the lumber industry by introducing a protected species of bear back into the wild. If his plan is to be successful, he must play Cupid to Archie and Ava, a wise-cracking, junk-food-loving circus bear smitten by a fastidious female

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians
programme.desc: In this live-action remake of the Disney animated favorite 101 Dalmatians, six time Academy Award-nominated actress Glenn Close plays infamous Cruella De Vil, an intense fashion maven whose lust for fur doubtless places her high on PETA's hit list. Cruella is the boss of kind fashion designer Anita, who, inspired by her Dalmatians, starts working up a design for a coat made with spotted fur. Cruella likes so much the idea that decides to make the garment out of real Dalmatians. But where to get the animals? Well, Cruella has two nasty but not especially intelligent henchmen, who've been known to kill the odd endangered species at her request

programme.title: Sesame Street
programme.desc: The Good Sport. Elmo learns how to win gracefully and lose graciously while playing hot potato with Abby

programme.title: Sesame Street
programme.desc: Afraid of the Bark. Elmo, Gina, Bob and Barkley help Zoe conquer her fear of dogs

programme.title: Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium
programme.desc: Dustin Hoffman has a ball as the eccentric centuries-old proprietor of a magical toy store who preps his shy and insecure assistant (Natalie Portman, winsomely winning as the babe in Toyland) to take over the business in this fantastic fantasy. A zany, brainy delight from first-time director Zach Helm, who wrote the screenplay. Jason Bateman costars as a stuffy accountant who comes to understanding the wonders of the place

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: Animated adventure sequel to Madagascar continuing the adventures of the animals from a New York zoo who have become trapped on the African island. While attempting to fly a plane back to New York, the animals crash land in mainland Africa, where they are amazed to be reunited with more of their own kind and, in some cases, their actual families. Unfortunately, life in Africa is not what it at first seems, with Alex soon falling foul of lion etiquette and the humans causing problems for all of the wild animals of the Savannah

programme.title: The Comebacks
programme.desc: Lambeau Fields is a football coach who suffers from a streak of bad luck that has become the stuff of legend. As a last resort, he takes a job coaching a college football team populated with some of the least desirable players imaginable. He must pull this ragtag crew together in order to salvage his career

programme.title: Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: An elderly couple in Nepal blinded by cataracts are given the opportunity to see again thanks to a simple surgery, but first they must be convinced to take the long journey to a clinic

programme.title: The 33
programme.desc: A gripping drama based on the true story of the mission to rescue 33 miners who were trapped in a underground mine for 69 days

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: An irritable ogre accepts a mission to save a princess on the condition that his home will be left free of fairytale characters

programme.title: The Peanuts Movie
programme.desc: Charlie Brown, Snoopy, Woodstock and friends embark on an epic adventure in this charming adaptation of the beloved comic strip

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Twenty-two years after Jurassic Park opened on Isla Nubar, a dinosaur-themed resort attracts thousands of visitors each year, just as John Hammond envisioned. However, following a bad sag in turnout a new effort is undertaken to revitalise Jurassic World, but once again mankind's attempts to interfere with nature bring ominous results

programme.title: The Time Machine
programme.desc: A scientist embarks upon a time-travelling adventure, experiencing the battles and destruction of several world wars before settling in a seemingly Edenic community in 802,701 AD. But while the citizens' idyllic existence is somewhat vacuous, with little independence or individual thought, a second community - a group of underground cannibals - steals his time machine, leaving him trapped in their dangerous world

programme.title: Real Sports With Bryant Gumbel

programme.title: Meet the Donors: Does Money Talk?
programme.desc: Alexandra Pelosi looks at money in politics and interviews wealthy donors to Republican and Democratic parties to ask them about their contributions and philosophies. Also: a look at efforts to enact campaign-finance reform

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.desc: WikiLeaks' Julian Assange and comedian Jeff Ross are the interview guests. The panelists are filmmaker Rob Reiner, former senator Rick Santorum and political commentator Tara Setmayer

programme.title: Black Knight
programme.desc: Jamal is an employee in Medieval World amusement park. After sustaining a blow to the head, he awakens to find himself in 14th century England

programme.title: Making of 'Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie'
programme.desc: A look at "Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie," a 2016 adaptation of the popular British sitcom about hard-living ladies Edina and Patsy, who flee to the French Riviera after they accidentally cause the death of a celebrity at a posh party. The film stars Jennifer Saunders and Joanna Lumley, and is directed by Mandie Fletcher

programme.title: The Bucket List
programme.desc: Jack Nicholson and Morgan Freeman star as two terminally ill cancer patients who decide to break out of the hospital and live their last days to the fullest in director Rob Reiner's seriocomic road movie. Edward Cole (Nicholson) is a corporate billionaire who is currently sharing a hospital room with blue-collar mechanic Carter Chambers (Freeman). Though initially the pair seems to have nothing in common, conversation gradually reveals that both men have a long list of goals they wish to accomplish before they kick the bucket, and an unrealized desire to discover what kind of men they really are. But one can't accomplish such lofty objectives from the confines of a hospital bed, so now, in order to live their lives to the absolute fullest, Edward and Carter will have to make a break for it. With a checklist that includes playing the poker tables in Monte Carlo, consuming copious amounts of caviar, racing the fastest machines on four wheels, and much more, these two terminally ill men will do their best to fit a lifetime of experience into their last remaining days while forging an unlikely, but truly remarkable, friendship

programme.title: The Peanuts Movie
programme.desc: The delightfully hilarious gang from The Peanuts returns after 35 years for their silver screen debut. Join Charlie Brown, Lucy, Linus and friends on a new epic adventure while Snoopy tracks down his nemesis, the Red Baron. Charles M. Schulz's iconic characters are brought to life in state of the art 3D animation from Blue Sky Studios, the creators of the Ice Age films. Directed by Steve Martino. Screenwriters include Craig Schulz, one of Charles M. Schulz's sons and Bryan Schulz, Craig's son and Cornelius Uliano

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: When their old pal Reuben has a heart attack after being double-crossed by scheming businessman Willie Bank, Danny Ocean's team of gifted grifters reunite to get their own back. Thriller

programme.title: National Lampoon's Van Wilder
programme.desc: Irreverent teen comedy focusing on a college undergraduate who, after being a senior student for seven years enjoying a hedonistic, fun-filled life, finds his wealthy father has cut off his allowance. He is left with no choice but to become a professional party organiser on campus. When an intrepid student reporter writes an unflattering article about him, the young man sets out to prove her wrong, falling in love with her along the way

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.desc: WikiLeaks' Julian Assange and comedian Jeff Ross are the interview guests. The panelists are filmmaker Rob Reiner, former senator Rick Santorum and political commentator Tara Setmayer

programme.title: Play It to the Bone
programme.desc: Boxing comedy drama about two ageing fighters who never made the big time but remain good friends. When an undercard bout in Las Vegas is cancelled at short notice, they are asked to step in. Unfortunately, they have to fight each other

programme.title: My Life in Ruins
programme.desc: Georgia (Nia Vardalos) came to Greece to follow a man. A few years later, she's been cast aside -- alone and adrift in a foreign land. Eventually, her passion for history leads her to a job as a tour guide. But Georgia is bored, and has lost her "kefi" (Greek for mojo) to boot. When taciturn sasquatch Poupi (Alexis Georgoulis) replaces the regular driver at the last minute, the frazzled tour guide thinks that her luck has just hit rock bottom. Thankfully, Georgia's latest batch of tourists is a more lively bunch than she's anticipated, and in between bouts with rival tour guide Nico (Alistair McGowan), she manages to form a genuine connection with wisecracking widower Irv (Richard Dreyfuss), a solo vacationer who maintains a jovial facade despite the fact that he misses his late wife dearly. With a little help from Irv, Georgia comes to realize that true love may be closer than she thinks -- if she could just recapture her kefi and open her eyes

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.desc: WikiLeaks' Julian Assange and comedian Jeff Ross are the interview guests. The panelists are filmmaker Rob Reiner, former senator Rick Santorum and political commentator Tara Setmayer

programme.title: Vice
programme.desc: A cop pursues a sentient female android that has escaped a hedonistic resort where people live out their wildest fantasies. Meanwhile, the owner of the resort dispatches a band of mercenaries to eliminate the android first

programme.title: The Night Of

programme.title: The Night Of
programme.desc: A Dark Crate. Naz is justifiably terrified of his new surroundings at Rikers Island, where an inmate with considerable influence could be crucial to his fate. Meanwhile, Stone visits Naz's parents to negotiate a fee for his services; and Box counsels a police officer on how to write up his report on the night of the arrest

programme.title: The Night Of

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Entrenched in the racial tumult of Los Angeles in the mid-1980's, a group of aspiring rappers banded together to revolutionize the global consumption of hip-hop and popular culture. NWA was born out of racial frustration and the disadvantaged economics of their South Central neighborhood. F. Gary Gray directs this biopic about the rise to stardom for the act that earned the moniker of "The World's Most Dangerous Group", featuring Ice Cube's son O'Shea Jackson Jr. playing the role of his father, Corey Hawkins as Dr. Dre, and Jason Mitchell as the late Eazy-E

programme.title: Joy Ride
programme.desc: After forays into film noir, thrillers, dramas, and even documentaries, director John Dahl tries the teen horror genre on for size. Paul Walker stars as Lewis Thomas, a college freshman embarking on a cross-country road trip during summer break to pick up his girlfriend Venna (Leelee Sobieski). Along for the ride is Lewis' brother Fuller (Steve Zahn), a practical joker who uses the car's CB radio to play a cruel prank on a lonely trucker known only by the handle Rusty Nail. The victim of Fuller's gag turns out to be a psychotic murderer and soon the brothers are being pursued by the relentless stalker, who gets his revenge in gruesome fashion. Joy Ride, which co-stars Matthew Kimbrough, was produced under the working title "Squelch."

programme.title: Looking: The Movie
programme.desc: Patrick returns to San Francisco after spending nearly a year in Denver, but while he's in town for a wedding, he also must confront some unresolved relationships he left in his rearview mirror

programme.title: Paper Towns
programme.desc: A nerdy teenager falls for the enigmatic girl next door, who vanishes after the two have an adventure together one night. She leaves behind a trail of clues, which lead him and his friends to go on a road trip to find her

programme.title: The Book of Life
programme.desc: This exciting animated adventure follows a young man named Manolo on a journey across three enchanting realms, where he faces his greatest fears and learns to follow his heart and embrace his future

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb
programme.desc: Larry and his historical pals journey to London to save the magic that brings the museum to life

programme.title: Our Brand Is Crisis
programme.desc: A female political consultant is hired to work on the campaign of a Bolivian presidential candidate who has fallen behind in the polls. She faces off against her rival, who is working on the opponent's campaign and is looking for every opportunity to antagonize her

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Young wizard-in-training Harry Potter (Daniel Radcliffe) returns to Hogwarts for his fifth year of studies, only to find that the magical community seems to be in a curious state of denial about his recent encounter with the sinister Lord Voldemort (Ralph Fiennes) in the fifth installment of the popular fantasy film series based on the best-selling books by author J.K. Rowling. Rumor has it that the dreaded Lord Voldemort has returned, but Minister for Magic Cornelius Fudge (Robert Hardy) isn't so sure what to make of all the hearsay currently floating around the campus of Hogwarts. Suspecting that Headmaster Albus Dumbledore (Michael Gambon) may be fueling the rumors regarding Voldemort's return in order to undermine his authority and lay claim to his job, Fudge entrusts newly arrived Defense Against the Dark Arts professor Dolores Umbridge (Imelda Staunton) with the task of tracking Dumbledore and keeping a protective watch over the nervous student body. The young wizards of Hogwarts will need something much more effective than Umbridge's Ministry-approved course in defensive magic if they are to truly succeed in the extraordinary battle that lies ahead, however, and when the administration fails to provide the students with the tools that they will need to defend Hogwarts against the fearsome powers of the Dark Arts, Hermione (Emma Watson), Ron (Rupert Grint), and Harry take it upon themselves to recruit a small group of students to form "Dumbledore's Army" in preparation for the ultimate supernatural showdown

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: Brilliant scientist Reed Richards builds a device that allows users to teleport to an alternate dimension, but an experiment involving it goes wrong and leaves him and his three teammates with unusual superpowers. The quartet are then forced to work together to battle an enemy from their past. This reboot of the iconic Marvel superhero team stars Miles Teller as Richards (who becomes Mr. Fantastic, able to bend and stretch his body into impossible shapes), Michael B. Jordan as Johnny Storm (aka the Human Torch, whose body can erupt in flames), Kate Mara as Sue Storm (aka the Invisible Woman -- no explanation needed), and Jamie Bell as Ben Grimm (who is transformed into the rock monster known as The Thing). Directed by Josh Trank, who previously worked with Jordan on the superhero film Chronicle

programme.title: Making of 'Pitch Perfect 2'
programme.desc: A look at "Pitch Perfect 2," a 2015 musical comedy about a collegiate a cappella group that enters an international competition no U.S. team has ever won. The sequel to the 2012 film stars Anna Kendrick, Skylar Astin and Rebel Wilson, and is directed by Elizabeth Banks

programme.title: Cry-Baby
programme.desc: John Waters does a quirky spin on '50s nostalgia in Cry-Baby, his musical homage to Rebel Without a Cause and +Romeo and Juliet. Set in Baltimore in 1954 at the birth of rock & roll, the film features Johnny Depp as Wade "Cry-Baby" Walker. Depp is pure charisma as a juvenile delinquent with a permanent tear slithering down his cheek, a reminder of his state-executed parents. In the depths of his despair appears goody-goody girl Allison (Amy Locane), who has a sexual crush on Cry-Baby. But Allison's Pat Boone-like boyfriend, Baldwin (Stephen E. Miller), the leader of the squares, is dead set against Cry-Baby and the rest of the juvenile delinquents and leads a revolt against them. In the resultant riot, the juvenile delinquents are blamed for the chaos, and Cry-Baby finds himself dispatched to reform school

programme.title: Connie and Carla
programme.desc: Nia Vardalos ("My Big Fat Greek Wedding") wrote and stars in this cheery musical farce. She and Toni Collette play two struggling Chicago singers who pose as drag performers in L.A. after they witness a mob hit in Chicago. David Duchovny, Stephen Spinella, Alec Mapa

programme.desc: Margaret Cho. Margaret Cho makes observations on dieting, racism and her sitcom "All American Girl." Taped at the Variety Arts Theater in Los Angeles

programme.title: Keeping the Faith
programme.desc: Two pals grow up with the same vocation; one becomes a rabbi, the other a Catholic priest. But their faith and friendship are tested when old schoolfriend Anna Reilly shows up in town. Comedy

programme.desc: After years of doing work integral to the success of major missions, an intelligent but self-conscious deskbound CIA analyst (Melissa McCarthy) is finally given the chance to go undercover as a homely "cat lady" in order to save her missing partner (Jude Law) and thwart a global disaster at the hands of a dangerous arms dealer. Written and directed by Paul Feig

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2

programme.title: 27 Dresses
programme.desc: Anne Fletcher's rom-com stars Katherine Heigl as Jane, an amateur wedding planner for her friends, who hopes to be the blushing bride herself (eventually) to her advertising executive boss George. Her ambition is dashed when her fun-loving gorgeous sister Tess appears on the scene and sweeps him off his feet, leaving Jane to plan yet another wedding. But maybe there's hope for her in the shape of Kevin, a journalist who is intrigued by Jane's perpetual bridesmaid role and wants to write a story about her, if only they didn't mix like oil and water... Edited for language

Written and directed by Paul Feig

programme.title: Not Another Teen Movie
programme.desc: At the stereotypical John Hughes High School discover whether the popular jock, Jake, can transform Janey, the ugly yet pretty girl, into the prom queen? Chris Evans and Jaime Pressly star. (2001)

programme.title: HBO Comedy Half-Hour
programme.desc: Margaret Cho. Margaret Cho makes observations on dieting, racism and her sitcom "All American Girl." Taped at the Variety Arts Theater in Los Angeles

programme.title: The Fabulous Baker Boys
programme.desc: Real-life siblings Beau and Jeff Bridges star as the eponymous Fabulous Baker Boys. Musical prodigies both, the Bakers have long been teamed as a twin-piano act, with the less talented Frank (Beau Bridges) coasting on the skills of his brilliant younger brother, Jack (Jeff Bridges). Their career dwindling to nickel-and-dime dates in second-rate clubs, the Bakers decide that they need a female vocalist to boost their popularity. They select auditioner Susie Diamond (Michelle Pfeiffer), who in addition to being a gifted songstress is drop-dead gorgeous. The newly renovated Baker Boys act scores a success, which is inevitably threatened by Susie's growing popularity and by Jack's insistence upon pursuing an affair with the girl

programme.title: Thunderstruck
programme.desc: A bumbling teenage basketball fan magically steals the skills of his sports idol during a free-throw competition, and he must restore them to the pro player in time for the play-offs

programme.title: The Great Outdoors
programme.desc: Chet is looking forward to his holiday. He's booked a lakeside house for the family, but he never counted on irritating brother-in-law Roman showing up too

programme.title: The Man From U.N.C.L.E.
programme.desc: In this spy thriller set in the early 1960s, CIA agent Napoleon Solo and KGB operative Illya Kuryakin team up to stop an international criminal organisation that is trafficking nuclear weapons and technology. Adaptation of the TV series of the same name

programme.title: Transamerica
programme.desc: The first film by Duncan Tucker, Transamerica stars Felicity Huffman as a pre-operative transsexual named Bree (whose given name was Stanley). One week before going under the knife, Bree learns that she fathered a boy who is now 17 and is in trouble with the law. Bree would like to ignore this information, but is forced to meet the young man, Toby (played by Kevin Zegers), by her analyst Margaret (Elizabeth Peña), who will not allow the surgery to happen unless Bree meets him and confronts this aspect of her past. Upon meeting, the son believes that Bree is simply a do-gooder. She buys a car and the two road-trip back to her home in Los Angeles, Bree all the while attempting to keep from Toby the truth of the situation

programme.title: Super Troopers
programme.desc: "Police Academy" meets "Animal House" in this raucous romp written by and starring the Broken Lizard comedy troupe. Jay Chandrasekhar, Kevin Heffernan, Paul Soter, Steve Lemme and Erik Stolhanske play Vermont state police officers battling crime and sparring with the local cops, who are trying to get them ousted. Lynda Carter, Daniel von Bargen. Chandrasekhar also directed

programme.title: Making of 'Spy'
programme.desc: A look at "Spy," a 2015 comedy about a CIA analyst thrust into the line of duty to track down a ruthless arms dealer. The film stars Melissa McCarthy, Jason Statham and Rose Byrne, and is written and directed by Paul Feig

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Ice Cube stars in this comedy-drama about a day in the life of those who work and chill at a barbershop on Chicago's South Side. Cedric the Entertainer stars as an opinionated barber who spends more time cracking jokes than cutting hair

programme.title: Dave Chappelle's Block Party
programme.desc: In September 2004, comedian Dave Chappelle took a break from his immensely successful Comedy Central show to stage a free, unpublicized, all-star hip-hop concert in the Clinton Hill neighborhood of Brooklyn, NY. Inviting fans over the Internet, on the street, and even in his family's hometown of Yellow Springs, OH, Chappelle asked filmmaker Michel Gondry to document the event from its inception on through to the performances themselves. The result is Dave Chappelle's Block Party, a concert film that provides not only a sampling of the music on display that September, but also an intimate look at the comedian himself. Gondry's cameras tag along with Chappelle as he visits Ohio, recruits a university marching band to play at the show, and surveys the opinions of Clinton Hill on the show that's about to take place. Along the way, we're introduced to some the comedian's favorite acts, in rehearsals and on-stage: Dead Prez, Jill Scott, Mos Def, the Roots, Erykah Badu, Kanye West, and the surprise reuniting of the Fugees

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo
programme.desc: Brash comedy about a fish-tank cleaner who agrees to house-sit for a gigolo and finds that answering a phone call opens up a new career as a male escort

programme.title: The Man From U.N.C.L.E.
programme.desc: In this spy thriller set in the early 1960s, CIA agent Napoleon Solo and KGB operative Illya Kuryakin team up to stop an international criminal organisation that is trafficking nuclear weapons and technology. Adaptation of the TV series of the same name

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: A film about the U.S. soldiers in a war movie run afoul of real-life drug traders in the Vietnamese jungle

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Ice Cube stars in this comedy-drama about a day in the life of those who work and chill at a barbershop on Chicago's South Side. Cedric the Entertainer stars as an opinionated barber who spends more time cracking jokes than cutting hair

programme.title: Broad Street Bullies
programme.desc: Documentary on the Philadelphia Flyers of the 1970s and the aggressive style of play that won them back-to-back Stanley Cups. Beloved in their home city and despised elsewhere, the Flyers were one of the most polarizing champions in sports. Among those interviewed are Bobby Clarke; Bill Barber; Dave Schultz; Bill Clement; and Gary Dornhoefer

programme.title: 27 Dresses
programme.desc: Anne Fletcher's rom-com stars Katherine Heigl as Jane, an amateur wedding planner for her friends, who hopes to be the blushing bride herself (eventually) to her advertising executive boss George. Her ambition is dashed when her fun-loving gorgeous sister Tess appears on the scene and sweeps him off his feet, leaving Jane to plan yet another wedding. But maybe there's hope for her in the shape of Kevin, a journalist who is intrigued by Jane's perpetual bridesmaid role and wants to write a story about her, if only they didn't mix like oil and water... Edited for language

programme.title: The Iron Giant
programme.desc: (1999) Based on Ted Hughes' book, Brad Bird's animation opens in 1957 in Maine, with the landing of the Iron Giant. Snacking his way through a village on TV antennas and cars, he finds a power plant which promises a more substantial meal. Which is where young Hogarth Hughes (voiced by Eli Marienthal) finds him and saves him from electrocution. Now all Hogarth has to do is hide the Iron Giant from his mother Annie (Jennifer Aniston) and the authorities who, with the Cold War at its height, determine that the massive being is a threat that must be destroyed all costs. M,W,S,HD

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: Spread Your Wings. No additional information is available

programme.title: A Little Curious
programme.desc: The Mop Show. Topics include "Sleep."

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales for Every Child
programme.desc: Aesop's Fables: A Whodunit Musical. In "Aesop's Fables: A Whodunit Musical," a detective interrogates Aesop's aging characters after the book of classic tales disappears from a gathering in their honor. Voices...Crow: Diahann Carroll. Lion: Harvey Korman. The Boy Who Cried Wolf: Jaleel White. Monsieur Fox: Dabney Coleman. Grape Fox: Melanie Chartoff. Tortoise/Ant: Ruth Brown. Mouse/Grasshopper: Kevin Pollak. Hare: Katey Sagal. Detective: Angie Dickinson

programme.desc: An orphan boy discovers his destiny as Peter Pan, and is whisked away to an enchanted land to battle the fearsome pirate Blackbeard with the help of the warrior woman Tiger Lily

programme.desc: Children talk about divorce and offer advice for parents to make sure kids are not manipulated, forgotten or mistreated when the time for permanent separation comes

programme.title: I Have Tourette's but Tourette's Doesn't Have Me
programme.desc: A look at children coping with Tourette Syndrome as they face the challenges of their condition and ridicule from their peers. Produced and directed by Ellen Goosenberg Kent

programme.title: The Secret Garden
programme.desc: Children's classic about an orphan who brings about a remarkable change in the life of her uncle's sombre mansion. Mary is sent to live with her uncle after the death of her parents, but his manner leaves her feeling bitterly alone. Then she discovers a young crippled boy whom she adopts as a playmate, and together they dare to explore a forbidden walled garden. Based on the novel by Frances Hodgson Burnett

programme.title: Casper
programme.desc: The Friendly Ghost attempts to befriend the 12-year-old daughter of a paranormal expert, but his nasty ghost uncles wreak havoc

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: An orphan boy discovers his destiny as Peter Pan, and is whisked away to an enchanted land to battle the fearsome pirate Blackbeard with the help of the warrior woman Tiger Lily

programme.title: The Secret of the Magic Gourd
programme.desc: Wonderful blend of live action and CGI animation telling the amazing coming-of-age tale of a lazy young boy (Zhu Oi Long) who discovers an enchanted fruit that has the power to grant wishes and give him anything his heart desires. But soon the magic gourd begins to drive the lad out of his gourd. Gigi Leung, Peisi Chen. Directed by John Chu and Frankie Chung, and written by Chu and Lam Kee To, who adapted the popular 1958 kids' book by Zhang Tianyi

programme.title: Max
programme.desc: A military dog from Afghanistan is adopted by his late handler's grieving family in the U.S., where his close bond with the soldier's brother leads to a life-altering revelation in this family-friendly adventure from MGM and director Boaz Yakin (who penned the screenplay alongside writer Sheldon Lettich)

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm
programme.desc: Con artists Will and Jake Grimm (Matt Damon and Heath Ledger) encounter a genuine fairy-tale curse that requires more than their usual fakery

programme.title: Making of 'The Second Best Exotic Marigold Hotel'
programme.desc: A look at "The Second Best Exotic Marigold Hotel," a 2015 comedy-drama about a man who expands his hotel chain when his first venture is limited to a single vacancy. The film stars Judi Dench, Maggie Smith, Bill Nighy and Dev Patel, and is directed by John Madden, who also made "The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel" (2012)

programme.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
programme.desc: In this quirky meditation on art, death and high school, a misfit teen befriends a female classmate who has leukemia. As they grow closer, she helps him with his creative endeavors and forces him to confront the messiness of real life

programme.desc: Little Red Riding Hood. B.D. Wong ("All-American Girl") provides the voice of the wolf in a Chinese-style adaptation of "Little Red Riding Hood," known here as Little Red Happy Coat. Voices: Amy Hill (Mama, Mrs. Oolong), Vu Mai (Red) and Brian Tochi (Tailor)

programme.title: The Electric Company
programme.desc: Oh Danny Boy. Danny and Hector team up in a double stable-tennis tournament

programme.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Movie
programme.desc: Based on a popular U.S. children's action show, this chopsocky sci-fi fantasy tells the tale of six courageous teenagers. Though they appear perfectly normal, they are in reality superheroes who are experts in karate. When a slimy villain attempts to take over the world, the kids must stop him

programme.title: Jem and the Holograms
programme.desc: A small-town teen's singing video goes viral and catapults her and her sister's band into global super stardom, but their newfound fame threatens to break apart their familial bonds in this spirited adapted musical fantasy

programme.title: Babe Ruth
programme.desc: A profile of the baseball legend includes film clips and interviews with former teammates, broadcasters and Ruth's adopted daughter, Julia Ruth Stevens. Also: Pulitzer Prize-winning photographer Nat Fein. Narrated by Liev Schreiber

programme.title: Princess Kaiulani
programme.desc: Princess Ka'iulani is the daughter of a Hawaiian princess and a Scottish businessman. As a teenager, she is sent to England to be educated but after the death of her uncle and the accession of her aunt, Ka'iulani becomes the next heir to the throne. Ka'iulani is torn between life in England with handsome young suitor Clive Davies or returning to her beloved Hawai'i

programme.title: Agent Cody Banks 2: Destination London
programme.desc: Frankie Muniz's mini James Bond races to stop a rogue CIA man's crazy plot. Adventure with cool gadgets and Hannah 'S-Club' Spearitt

programme.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Movie
programme.desc: Based on a popular U.S. children's action show, this chopsocky sci-fi fantasy tells the tale of six courageous teenagers. Though they appear perfectly normal, they are in reality superheroes who are experts in karate. When a slimy villain attempts to take over the world, the kids must stop him

programme.title: Turbo: A Power Rangers Movie
programme.desc: The second feature-length outing for the high-kicking, power-punching defenders of mankind sees the teenagers do battle against the evil Divatox, a screeching villainess hellbent on ruling the galaxy. Her masterplan is to capture Lerigot, a kindly wizard with fantastical powers whom she intends to use to release Maligore, a hideous molten monster. Only the heroic Power Rangers stand in her way

programme.title: Jem and the Holograms
programme.desc: A small-town teen's singing video goes viral and catapults her and her sister's band into global super stardom, but their newfound fame threatens to break apart their familial bonds in this spirited adapted musical fantasy

programme.title: Bikini Model Mayhem
programme.desc: A scheming politician programs bikini-clad robots to seduce his opponents so he can blackmail them

programme.title: Unfriended
programme.desc: One year after a humiliating viral video drove a teen to commit suicide, her high-school classmates are terrorized by an anonymous online presence seeking revenge

programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: A legendary monster hunter battles Count Dracula, Frankenstein's creature and the Wolf Man

programme.title: Dirty Driving: Thundercars of Indiana
programme.desc: Documentarian Jon Alpert visits Anderson, Ind., where residents who are still reeling from the closing of a once-thriving General Motors factory seek distraction from a struggling economy in auto racing at the local speedway on Friday nights

programme.title: The Namesake
programme.desc: A Bengali family tries to acclimate to life in the U.S. in this poignant and bittersweet saga of cultures clashing across generations. Their teenage son (Kal Penn) does not embrace their Indian heritage until he visits Calcutta, where he gains an understanding of the importance of his family's past. Indian-born Mira Nair directed from a script by Sooni Taraporevala, who adapted Pulitzer Prize-winner Jhumpa Lahiri's novel. Bollywood superstar Tabu costars as Penn's old-world mother

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding installment in the dystopian young-adult series, Thomas and the other Gladers journey across an obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the organization known as WCKD

programme.title: Alpha Dog
programme.desc: This gritty, highly intense fact-based crime drama tells the sordid tale of a group of drug dealers who kidnap the teenage brother (Anton Yelchin) of a client (Ben Foster) who owes them money and refuses to pay. At first the hostage is treated like their guest, but soon things spiral out of control and a pivotal decision about his fate must be reached. The outstanding young cast is led by Justin Timberlake, Emile Hirsch and Shawn Hatosy. Bruce Willis and Sharon Stone are also featured

programme.title: 28 Weeks Later
programme.desc: The US army flies in to reboot a destroyed London, but those still infected with the Rage Virus have other plans. Strong language/strong bloody violence/flashing images. (2007)(96 mins)

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: Neglected by her adulterous husband and left feeling particularly vulnerable as her marriage crumbles, lonely teacher Claire (Jennifer Lopez) has an affair with a younger neighbor (Ryan Guzman) that turns terrifying as his fiery lust morphs into dangerous obsession. John Corbett, Ian Nelson, and Kristin Chenoweth co-star

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: The Field Trip. Danny wants to impress Amanda on a field trip organized by history teacher Mr. Hayden

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A raunchy yet heartfelt comedy from director Judd Apatow about Amy (Amy Schumer), a commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City, who must reevaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: A former British Special Forces agent now delivers cargo, no questions asked, in the south of France, but soon finds himself mixed up in a slave-trade ring

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding installment in the dystopian young-adult series, Thomas and the other Gladers journey across an obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the organization known as WCKD

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: Neglected by her adulterous husband and left feeling particularly vulnerable as her marriage crumbles, lonely teacher Claire (Jennifer Lopez) has an affair with a younger neighbor (Ryan Guzman) that turns terrifying as his fiery lust morphs into dangerous obsession. John Corbett, Ian Nelson, and Kristin Chenoweth co-star

programme.title: High Fidelity
programme.desc: When record shop owner Rob is dumped by his latest girlfriend, he compiles a list of his top five worst break-ups and attempts to reconnect with the ladies in question. Meanwhile, he and his oddball assistants contemplate the effect their love of music has had on their lives

programme.title: Halloween H20: 20 Years Later
programme.desc: Laurie Strode is still tormented by her ordeal with killer Michael Myers 20 years on. When she learns that he has escaped once again, she becomes convinced he will track her down

programme.title: Sweet Sixteen
programme.desc: Gritty social-realist drama. Determined to have a normal family life once his mother gets out of prison, Greenock teenager Liam devises a plan to raise enough money to buy a new home for himself and his mother. Dir: Ken Loach

programme.title: Clean Slate
programme.desc: Dana Carvey stars as a PI who loses his memory prior to testifying against a mob boss

programme.title: I Origins
programme.desc: Writer/director Mike Cahill's drama I Origins centers on medical student Ian Gray (Michael Pitt). Ian specializes in the evolution of the human eye. One day he attends a party where he meets a masked woman whose eyes transfix him, and soon the two fall in love. Years later, Ian makes a startling discovery in the lab, forcing him on a trek across the globe in order to uncover profound truths about mankind. I Origins screened at the 2014 Sundance Film Festival

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords
programme.sub-title: Love Is the Weapon of Choice
programme.desc: Love Is the Weapon of Choice. Bret and Jemaine become rivals for the attentions of the same woman (Kristen Wiig), who happens to have an epileptic dog that has gone missing

programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: Outcast Van Helsing is charged with a mission to go to the shadowy world of Transylvania and vanquish the evil Count Dracula. He joins forces with a beautiful woman descended from a powerful royal family, but finds that his goal of annihilating the enemy brings him face to face with his own past

programme.title: Deception
programme.desc: Involving, noirish thriller featuring a winning chemistry between Hugh Jackman and Ewan McGregor. Jackman plays a smooth-talking lawyer who introduces McGregor's shy corporate accountant to the wild world of a secretive sex club known as The List, whose motto is "no rough stuff and no names." Unfortunately, McGregor's involvement leads him into a maelstrom of double-crosses, intrigue and murder. Michelle Williams. Directed by Marcel Langenegger. Jackman is also one of the film's producers

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: A helicopter pilot races to rescue his estranged daughter after a massive earthquake devastates California

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: This touching biopic of celebrated physicist Stephen Hawking explores his early years at Cambridge, where he fell in love with liberal-arts student and future wife Jane shortly before being diagnosed with ALS. As the years progress, Jane begins to feel more like a nurse than a spouse, and Hawking develops feelings for a woman who is hired to care for him

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Edward is recruited by a shadowy society at college and rises through the Cold War ranks to become a CIA spymaster. Intricate espionage thriller, only De Niro's second film as director

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: A helicopter pilot races to rescue his estranged daughter after a massive earthquake devastates California

programme.title: Freeheld
programme.desc: Emotional docudrama about terminally ill New Jersey police officer Laurel Hester, whose 2005 legal battle for the right to pass her pension benefits on to her female life partner became an equal-rights milestone

programme.title: Furious 7
programme.desc: Tight-knit gang of street racers battle a new nemesis and rescue a software genius from terrorists

programme.title: 25th Hour
programme.desc: Edward Norton is sensational in director Spike Lee's riveting drama about a drug dealer and his last night of freedom before prison. The film is also a poignant salute to the resilience of New York City in the aftermath of Sept. 11. The strong supporting cast includes Barry Pepper, Rosario Dawson, Philip Seymour Hoffman and ex-football star Tony Siragusa

programme.title: State of Play
programme.desc: A look at the challenges of balancing professional success in sports and family obligations, focusing on three couples on the field and at home—Mike and Kiya Tomlin; Kevin and DeLana Harvick; and Scott and Megan Lenhoff

programme.title: Strictly Business
programme.desc: A black yuppie rethinks life on the corporate fast-track after he falls in love with an ultra-hip club promoter. Knowing that she finds him a total square, he seeks the advice of a cool young mail clerk on how to approach her

programme.title: Real Sports With Bryant Gumbel
programme.desc: A special episode offering a comprehensive portrait of the International Olympic Committee, its impact on international competition and its power and influence. Also: a look at the IOC's role in the turmoil surrounding the games in Rio

programme.title: Frankie and Johnny
programme.desc: Dowdy diner waitress Frankie is courted by short-order cook Johnny, who is determined to win her over by any means necessary

programme.title: Phil Spector
programme.desc: Al Pacino stars as legendary music producer Phil Spector in this compelling film exploring Spector's relationship with his attorney (Helen Mirren) during his first trial for murder

programme.title: Carlito's Way
programme.desc: Powerful crime drama about a petty criminal who is released after five years in prison when his corrupt lawyer exploits a legal technicality. Carlito is determined to go straight, but he agrees to take part in a lucrative shady business deal at his attorney's instigation - figuring to discharge the debt of gratitude he owes. Despite his intentions, he finds himself relentlessly drawn back into the world he sought to escape

programme.title: Dog Day Afternoon
programme.desc: A bank robbery in Brooklyn goes wrong and evolves into a protracted hostage situation, turning the plan's mastermind into a media celebrity and the event into a media circus. Based on a true story

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: Al Pacino stars as Tony Montana, an exiled Cuban criminal who goes to work for Miami drug lord Robert Loggia. Montana rises to the top of Florida's crime chain, appropriating Loggia's cokehead mistress (Michelle Pfeiffer) in the process. Howard Hawks' "X Marks the Spot" motif in depicting the story line's many murders is dispensed with in the 1983 Scarface; instead, we are inundated with blood by the bucketful, especially in the now-infamous buzz saw scene. One carry-over from the original Scarface is Tony Montana's incestuous yearnings for his sister Gina (Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio). The screenplay for the 1983 Scarface was written by Oliver Stone

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Driven by an extravagant, tour-de-force performance by Al Pacino, Scent of a Woman is the story of Frank Slade (Pacino), a blind, retired army colonel who hires Charlie Simms (Chris O'Donnell), a poor college student on the verge of expulsion, to take care of him over Thanksgiving weekend. At the beginning of the weekend, Frank takes Charlie to New York, where he reveals to the student that he intends to visit his family, have a few terrific meals, sleep with a beautiful woman and, finally, commit suicide. The film follows the mis-matched pair over the course of the weekend, as they learn about life through their series of adventures. Though the story is a little contrived and predictable, it pulls all the right strings, thanks to O'Donnell's sympathetic supporting role and Pacino's powerful lead performance, for which he won his first Academy Award. Scent of a Woman is based on the 1975 Italian film Profumo Di Donna

programme.title: Sea of Love
programme.desc: Jaded cop Frank trawls the lonely hearts column for clues to identify a serial killer preying on lovesick single men. Then he places his own advert, hoping to flush the killer out. Excellent crime thriller

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: Drama looking at how whistleblower Dr Jeffrey Wigand and a producer on the American current affairs show 60 Minutes took on the US tobacco industry in a bid to expose the addictive nature of nicotine. Focusing on the human interest story of a family man under terrifying pressures, the factually based action also vividly brings home the David and Goliath story of a battle that made US legal history

programme.title: You Don't Know Jack
programme.desc: A study of Dr. Jack Kevorkian, the enigmatic pathologist who courted controversy in the late 20th century for his advocacy of the right to die for terminally ill patients

programme.title: Making of 'Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials'
programme.desc: A look at "Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials," the 2015 sequel to "The Maze Runner" (2014) in which Thomas, Teresa, and the rest of the Gladers prepare for phase two of their trials after narrowly escaping the first test. The film stars Dylan O'Brien, Kaya Scodelario and Thomas Brodie-Sangster, and is directed by Wes Ball

programme.title: The Girl
programme.desc: Alfred Hitchcock was at the height of his fame and creativity when, in 1962, he chose an unknown fashion model to star in his most ambitious film, The Birds. But as he sculpted Tippi Hedren into the perfect Hitchcock blonde of his imagination, he became obsessed with the impossible dream of winning the real woman's love. His failure destroyed both of their careers. Screenwriter Gwyneth Hughes has interviewed Tippi Hedren and surviving members of Hitchcock's crew. This film tells their full tragic story

programme.title: We Are Marshall
programme.desc: Fact-based sports saga about the rebuilding of the football squad at West Virginia's Marshall University after a 1970 plane crash claims the lives of much of the team

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: A lone astronaut is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars after an exploratory mission goes awry, and must use his ingenuity to create a habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, his crewmates and a team of scientists work to rescue him, in defiance of NASA protocol

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: The Democratic National Convention in Philadelphia; voter ID laws in the U.S.; and the aftermath of the recent coup in Turkey are discussed

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Elidee. Vernon's advised to keep mum about how he got injured; Spencer and Joe clash over the handling of a client as they fend off Andre's threats; Charles isn't sure he's ready for a new challenge; Ricky thinks about relocating

programme.title: The Night Of
programme.desc: The Art of War. Stone looks for clues about the crime

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this nail-biting adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of climbers successfully scale Mount Everest, only to be faced with tragedy when a monster snowstorm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: Four Oscars, including Best Picture and Best Director, went to Ron Howard's engrossing drama about John Nash, the volatile Nobel Prize-winning mathematician

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: Oliver Stone's scorching drama of a young dealer seduced by money and power, who hooks up with a high-powered company trader. Michael Douglas won an Oscar for his performance as stockbroking devil Gordon Gekko

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: A lone astronaut is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars after an exploratory mission goes awry, and must use his ingenuity to create a habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, his crewmates and a team of scientists work to rescue him, in defiance of NASA protocol

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this nail-biting adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of climbers successfully scale Mount Everest, only to be faced with tragedy when a monster snowstorm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Close to Home. Kyle goes looking for Allison; Megan gets shocking news; and Anderson turns a bad situation into a worse one

programme.title: Batman Forever
programme.desc: The Caped Crusader battles Two-Face and the Riddler in this sequel

programme.title: Village of the Damned
programme.desc: This film is a remake of the classic 1960 science-fiction thriller, Village of the Damned, which was based on the novel The Midwich Cuckoos by John Wyndham. Veteran horror director John Carpenter is at the helm this time, with Christopher Reeve replacing George Sanders in the starring role. Aliens put the entire village of Midwich to sleep for 24 hours and impregnate many women. Reeve plays Alan Chaffee, the town doctor, whose wife Barbara (Karen Kahn) is one of the women carrying an alien baby. Visiting scientist Dr. Susan Verner (Kristie Alley) is monitoring the situation for the government. She supervises a mass birthing in a barn. The children turn out to be white-haired, glassy-eyed, and telepathic. Their plan is to use their supernatural powers to kill the villagers and help the aliens take over, and only Chaffee and Verner can stop them

programme.title: Batman: Under the Red Hood
programme.desc: In this action-packed animated adventure, diabolical vigilante Red Hood (voice of Jensen Ackles) sets out to clean up the streets of Gotham City and destroy Batman. Meanwhile, the Joker reappears to taunt Batman in his darkest hour

Sex comedy about a successful, middle-aged Hollywood songwriter who fails hopelessly in love with the woman of his dreams. He even follows the girl and her new husband to their Mexican honeymoon resort, but, while his behaviour seems sure to land him in trouble, out of the blue fate plays into his hand

programme.title: Unfaithful
programme.desc: When a suburban wife meets a Manhattan book dealer and begins an affair, her husband begins to suspect something and hires a detective. Soon learning the truth, the husband takes matters into his own hands and decides to confront his wife's lover

programme.title: What We Do in the Shadows
programme.desc: Three vampires try to blend into modern society while still feeding their fiendish urges

programme.title: Gentlemen Broncos
programme.desc: A nerdy teenager has his idea for a science fiction novel stolen by a pretentious professional author

programme.title: The Longest Ride
programme.desc: A star-crossed love affair begins between a retired bull rider who wants to get back in the saddle and an art student preparing to seek her fortune in New York City. As their relationship is put to the ultimate test, the wisdom of an ageing man who recalls his own lost love serves as a source of great inspiration

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: A South African mercenary and a fisherman try to recover a priceless diamond amid the civil war in 1990s Sierra Leone

programme.title: Kill the Messenger
programme.desc: In this incredible true story, a reporter investigates a possible link between the CIA and the importing of cocaine into the U.S. in the 1980s

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Close to Home. Kyle goes looking for Allison; Megan gets shocking news; and Anderson turns a bad situation into a worse one

programme.title: Frank Miller's Sin City
programme.desc: Four tales from Sin City including a muscular brute who's looking for the person responsible for the death of his beloved Goldie

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Close to Home. Kyle goes looking for Allison; Megan gets shocking news; and Anderson turns a bad situation into a worse one

programme.title: The Specialist
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Sylvester Stallone as an explosives expert who becomes involved in one woman's obsessive desire for vengeance. Ray Quick is hired by May Munro (Sharon Stone) to kill the people who murdered her parents when she was a child. However, Ray soon discovers that May is not quite all that she seems and that a shadow from his own past has returned to haunt him

programme.title: Scream 3
programme.desc: In Hollywood, Sidney Prescott must once again confront her demons when the stars of a horror movie sequel based on her life begin to die

programme.title: MacArthur
programme.desc: Courage and daring earned him a general's stripes. But it was Douglas MacArthur's promise "I shall return" which made him a hero, when he returned to the Philippines to fight the Japanese in WWII

programme.title: Being There
programme.desc: Peter Sellers plays Chance, a simple-minded gardener who has to cope with the outside world once his employer passes on in Hal Ashby's bittersweet film. Melvyn Douglas won an oscar for best supporting actor for his role as Benjamin Turnbull Rand

programme.title: Get Hard
programme.desc: Will Ferrell and Kevin Hart headline this Warner Bros. comedy about a wrongfully convicted investment banker who prepares for prison life with the help of the man who washes his car. Etan Cohen directs, with Ian Roberts and Jay Martel handling screenwriting duties

programme.title: Lady in the Water
programme.desc: Apartment building superintendent Cleveland Heep rescues what he thinks is a young woman from the pool he maintains. When he discovers that she is actually a character from a bedtime story who is trying to make the journey back to her home, he works with his tenants to protect his new friend from the creatures that are determined to keep her in our world

programme.title: Eagle Eye
programme.desc: Jerry Shaw and Rachel Holloman were complete strangers at the beginning of the day, but that changed the instant a strange woman called to threaten both their lives and the lives of their loved ones. Suddenly forced into a series of increasingly dangerous situations, Jerry and Rachel must now take orders from a woman who's using everyday technology to track and control their every move

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A genetically engineered assassin finds himself on the run after he is double-crossed on a mission in Russia in this stylised adaptation of the popular video game

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Close to Home. Kyle goes looking for Allison; Megan gets shocking news; and Anderson turns a bad situation into a worse one

programme.title: Crimson Tide
programme.desc: A radical group has seized control of a nuclear missile base and the USS Alabama, a state-of-the-art nuclear submarine, has been ordered into action in this taut thriller. But when a fragmented message arrives onboard to launch a defensive strike against the enemy, suddenly a fiery battle of wills erupts between the veteran sub commander - who never questions orders - and his more cautious second officer, who can't help but suspect a command to start a nuclear war. Gene Hackman and Denzel Washington star(r)

programme.title: Get Hard
programme.desc: Will Ferrell and Kevin Hart headline this Warner Bros. comedy about a wrongfully convicted investment banker who prepares for prison life with the help of the man who washes his car. Etan Cohen directs, with Ian Roberts and Jay Martel handling screenwriting duties(r)

programme.title: The Water Diviner
programme.desc: In this sweeping epic set in the Australian outback, a father gifted with the power to find water flowing underground fulfills a promise to his wife to locate their sons lost at the battle of Gallipoli(r)

programme.title: Consenting Adults
programme.desc: A man is arrested on suspicion of murder after succumbing to his neighbour's desire for a wife-swapping session. A suburban couple's lifestyle is enlivened with the arrival of new neighbours, and before long the husband is talked into a wife-swapping deal. But the next morning his 'new partner' is found bludgeoned to death - and he finds himself arrested on a murder charge(r)
